story:
Product Description

Film Sketchers™ is a 7" x 10" storyboard journal designed to help you organize your ideas and streamline your video projects in order to save you time and money.

Bring Your Vision to Life™ with Film Sketchers!

 

What is a Storyboard?

A storyboard is a visual planning tool used to create an illustrated representation of a movie or video before you start filming.  Storyboards are used by many different people:

  • Storyboard Artists
  • Video Editors
  • Animators
  • Producers
  • Directors
  • Film students
  • Entrepreneurs

 

Features & Benefits

Film Sketchers™ features 150 pages of 70-pound weight drawing paper with three 16:9 Aspect Ratio* storyboard frames per page, including Scene, Shot & Time sequence; plus college-ruled lines beside each frame for narration, dialogue or notes.

All of these attributes combined together into one product makes Film Sketchers™ stand out in our current market:

  • 150 pages of 70 lb. weight drawing paper
  • Three 16:9 aspect ratio storyboard frames per page (450 frames total)
  • Designated headings for Scene, Shot & Time
  • Text lines with college-ruled spacing for narration or notes
  • Sturdy paperboard covers (front/back)
  • Double-Looped Wire-O® binding (allows pages to rotate 360 degrees)

*16:9 Aspect Ratio has become the most common aspect ratio for televisions and computer monitors since 2009.  It is the international standard format for HDTV, Full HD, non-digital television and analog widescreen television.  It is also used inversely as (9:16) as the ratio for mobile phone screens.

 

On The Go...

Film Sketchers™ will fit perfectly in your backpack, or laptop case, giving you the freedom to take your ideas with you wherever you go!

 

 

My Inspiration

Film Sketchers™ began as a sincere and humble homemade gift idea.  I wanted to encourage and support my son's creativity while he was drawing a storyboard for a video project at his school.  But what started out as a gift, quickly evolved into a quality journal prototype for many others to enjoy.

 

My Background

Growing up in a family of artists, I had always been exposed to art & design. Pencil drawing became one of my favorite forms of artistic expression and I preferred using smooth drawing paper in order to capture fine detail. This background helped me decide which materials to use for Film Sketchers™.  Before I started this project, I knew I'd use a slightly heavier weight paper with a smooth texture, offering more opacity for both drawing and writing, without adding any extra bulk.  (Jimi Hendrix in pencil) © 1996-2018 by G.S. Winsor

 

Company Overview

Vision: Mindful Media for a Future Mind™

Mission: To Uplift Humanity and To Inspire Creativity for Enlightened Self-Interest.

I created Future Mind Media, LLC to publish Film Sketchers™ in order to make its debut as the company's first product line.

With guidance from my trusted business & life coach, I've been able to clearly define my objectives in order to pursue this endeavor.  With a background in art, sales, and Internet business development, I've been able to utilize my skills and experience in order to launch this campaign.

 

 

The Environment

Future Mind Media, LLC is based in the Pacific Northwest, surrounded by evergreen trees, sparkling rivers and majestic mountains.  I love nature and I take pride in doing my part in safeguarding the environment by using sustainable materials manufactured by certified companies that participate in sustainable business practices and support responsible forestry management.  All paper products used in Film Sketchers™ are certified by The Forest Stewardship Council (FSC).

Capital Requested ($7,500)

With your financial support, I will be able to use and manage the funds raised through Indiegogo in order to publish Film Sketchers™ and to grow Future Mind Media, LLC to its fullest potential.  All funds raised through this campaign shall go towards that purpose.

A minimum of $7,500 is requested in order to launch Film Sketchers™.  Here is the following cost breakdown:

Production Costs: $5,000.  This amount will allow me to produce enough volume in order to offer the lowest retail price point possible right out of the starting gate.

Operations Costs: $1,000. This amount will allow me to set up a merchant account, to cover the cost of business insurance, and to purchase the minimum business equipment required as I work out of my home office.  Some of this equipment will include a workstation with storage shelves, office supplies, plus post-production packaging & shipping supplies.

Marketing Expenses: $500.  This includes both print and online marketing, in addition to website hosting expenses I haven't already covered.

Indiegogo Platform Fee: Approximately $500 (depends on final funding amount reached, at 5% of final amount).

Stripe Credit Card Processing Fees: Approximately $500 (depends on the final amount of transactions with 3% per transaction + $0.30 per transaction).

So far, I have already contributed over $3,500 of my own personal funds in order to set up my company, including licensing fees, trademark fees, bar codes, ISBN numbers, design software and product development costs, such as prototypes.  I had spent months on creating a solid business plan and I frequently revise and update my marketing plan and financial plan as needed.

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Perks

For your contribution, I am providing perks in the form of the product itself.

You will get to be one of the first backers to enjoy Film Sketchers™ for yourself, or to give as gifts for your friends, loved ones and colleagues!

 

My Gratitude

On a personal note, I would like to sincerely thank everyone who helped support me in this endeavor... and that also includes everyone who backs this campaign.  It's not easy to pull one's self up by the bootstraps and to defy social norms and expectations in order to create a new paradigm for one's own life; which is why I am so grateful for those who challenged me to keep moving forward on this project, and to those who inspired me to stay excited - no matter what.

In turn, I am delighted to offer Film Sketchers™ as a tool to help others with their own creative processes, so they too can move forward and stay excited.

Thank you for your support!

- G.S.Winsor

(Creator of Film Sketchers™ and Founder of Future Mind Media, LLC.)

story:
Story of My Book

See Me is about the importance of living authentically as a young adult. My book aims to inspire young adults to stay true to who they are through guiding principles and the incredible stories of others who have mastered the art of authentic living.

My name is Hailey Rodgers and I am the author of See Me. I wrote this book because I believe every human being is exceptional and I believe when you are a young adult, it is the hardest time to believe that about yourself. I have discovered key principles throughout my journey as a young adult along with the incredible stories of others on how we can all embrace our inner weirdness and be inspired to live an authentic life.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover the value in staying true to who are and embrace being your weird as f*ck self (yes there is swearing, and no the book is not censored). In this book, I hope to instill the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for authentic living in you. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you stay true to who you are amidst the pressure to conform to societal norms. 

In this book, you will learn about three broad interconnected topics:

  • How to be authentic
    • In this part, you will unravel the art of authentic living through various topics including: self-awareness, self-comparisons, self-love, body image, etc.
  • How to be happy
    • In this part, we will discuss ways on how we can optimize our time being happy and how to handle the inevitable times where we won’t be.
  • How to be successful
    • In this part, we will come to a final definition of success, and that’s for you to find out.

You will love this book if you are a young adult who feels they haven’t been truly seen for who they are (yet).

See Me is a non-fiction book that speaks to Millennials and Gen Zers who are looking to discover how to be authentic, happy and successful for the first time.

 

The Book - See Me

The book is written in 3 Parts...

Part 1 contains the introduction and various chapters that aim to unravel the art of authentic living. This section will dive into various topics including self-awareness, self-comparisons, self-love, body image, caring, etc. Various stories help illustrate these topics so that you can see how these principles can be truly lived by. One story in relation to body image is about a young girl named Faith who recently recovered from Anorexia Nervosa, a severe eating disorder. Another story helps demonstrate the concept of caring (about the things that matter to you). This story is about a guy named Jordan who decided to drop out of school and instead focus on his passion for music and crafting drums. He now makes drums for various famous bands across Canada including the Arkells, July Talk, The Strumbellas, and Half Moon Run. 

Part 2 explores the idea of happiness. This part emphasizes how to optimize our time being happy on this planet while at the same time being able to cope when we are otherwise not. The topics include gratitude, forgiveness, purposeful living, and helping others be happy as well. Purposeful living is illustrated by Christian, who found his purpose through magic and does various performances for large audience shows. Helping others be happy is illustrated by Hanna who always aims to help others reach their most optimal state of happiness and wellness. 

Part 3 defines the concept of success. The reader will learn what success truly means and topics including mindfulness will help illustrate what true success looks like. Mindfulness is complemented by Shanshan’s story, a yoga instructor, outdoor and travel guru who understands what it truly means to be intrinsically successful.
 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December 2019
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to make help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this Winter
When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish
  • A personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your name will appear in a Special Acknowledgements section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book
  • And more...

 

About the Author

Hailey Rodgers has studied at the Smith School of Business at Queen’s University, aiming to pursue a career in marketing and entrepreneurship. She has been writing for a publisher called Her Campus for almost two years and is currently the Co-President of her university’s chapter. Hailey is also a founding member of Step Above Stigma, a mental health organization that aims to promote mental health advocacy and end the stigma surrounding mental health. Hailey is a go-getter.

I wrote this book because I want every young adult to see the value in being unconventional. I truly believe every young adult is exceptional and I want every individual to master the art of authentic living.

Hailey Rodgers is an introverted-extrovert, writing, observing, and reflecting 80% of the time and the other 20% of the time (when there isn’t a crowd) she is dedicated to being outgoing, humourous, and a big f*cking weirdo. Her go-to outfit is Doc Martens, an over-sized thrifted plaid jacket, and a Yankees baseball cap (even though she doesn’t watch baseball). 

For more information, you can connect with Hailey at hailey.rodgers@hotmail.com

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/haileyrodddgers/

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/hailey.rodgers

LinkedIn: //www.linkedin.com/in/hailey-rodgers

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #SeeMe and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page

Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

 

Thank you so much of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Hailey

My book aims to inspire young adults to stay true to who they are through guiding principles and the incredible stories of others who have mastered the art of authentic living.My name is Hailey Rodgers and I am the author of See Me. I wrote this book because I believe every human being is exceptional and I believe when you are a young adult, it is the hardest time to believe that about yourself. I have discovered key principles throughout my journey as a young adult along with the incredible stories of others on how we can all embrace our inner weirdness and be inspired to live an authentic life.My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover the value in staying true to who are and embrace being your weird as f*ck self (yes there is swearing, and no the book is not censored). In this book, I hope to instill the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for authentic living in you. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you stay true to who you are amidst the pressure to conform to societal norms. In this book, you will learn about three broad interconnected topics:

How to be authenticIn this part, you will unravel the art of authentic living through various topics including: self-awareness, self-comparisons, self-love, body image, etc.

How to be happyIn this part, we will discuss ways on how we can optimize our time being happy and how to handle the inevitable times where we won’t be.

How to be successfulIn this part, we will come to a final definition of success, and that’s for you to find out.


You will love this book if you are a young adult who feels they haven’t been truly seen for who they are (yet).See Me is a non-fiction book that speaks to Millennials and Gen Zers who are looking to discover how to be authentic, happy and successful for the first time.
 
The Book - See Me
The book is written in 3 Parts...Part 1 contains the introduction and various chapters that aim to unravel the art of authentic living. This section will dive into various topics including self-awareness, self-comparisons, self-love, body image, caring, etc. Various stories help illustrate these topics so that you can see how these principles can be truly lived by. One story in relation to body image is about a young girl named Faith who recently recovered from Anorexia Nervosa, a severe eating disorder. Another story helps demonstrate the concept of caring (about the things that matter to you). This story is about a guy named Jordan who decided to drop out of school and instead focus on his passion for music and crafting drums. He now makes drums for various famous bands across Canada including the Arkells, July Talk, The Strumbellas, and Half Moon Run. Part 2 explores the idea of happiness. This part emphasizes how to optimize our time being happy on this planet while at the same time being able to cope when we are otherwise not. The topics include gratitude, forgiveness, purposeful living, and helping others be happy as well. Purposeful living is illustrated by Christian, who found his purpose through magic and does various performances for large audience shows. Helping others be happy is illustrated by Hanna who always aims to help others reach their most optimal state of happiness and wellness. Part 3 defines the concept of success. The reader will learn what success truly means and topics including mindfulness will help illustrate what true success looks like. Mindfulness is complemented by Shanshan’s story, a yoga instructor, outdoor and travel guru who understands what it truly means to be intrinsically successful. 
What I Need & What You'll Get
This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December 2019
The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder
The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
The Copyediting for My Book - to make help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this Winter
When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish
A personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
Your name will appear in a Special Acknowledgements section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
Early access to the Introduction of my book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book
And more...

 
About the Author
Hailey Rodgers has studied at the Smith School of Business at Queen’s University, aiming to pursue a career in marketing and entrepreneurship. She has been writing for a publisher called Her Campus for almost two years and is currently the Co-President of her university’s chapter. Hailey is also a founding member of Step Above Stigma, a mental health organization that aims to promote mental health advocacy and end the stigma surrounding mental health. Hailey is a go-getter.I wrote this book because I want every young adult to see the value in being unconventional. I truly believe every young adult is exceptional and I want every individual to master the art of authentic living.Hailey Rodgers is an introverted-extrovert, writing, observing, and reflecting 80% of the time and the other 20% of the time (when there isn’t a crowd) she is dedicated to being outgoing, humourous, and a big f*cking weirdo. Her go-to outfit is Doc Martens, an over-sized thrifted plaid jacket, and a Yankees baseball cap (even though she doesn’t watch baseball). For more information, you can connect with Hailey at hailey.rodgers@hotmail.com
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/haileyrodddgers/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/hailey.rodgers
LinkedIn: //www.linkedin.com/in/hailey-rodgers
 
Risks & Challenges
The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.
 
Other Ways You Can HelpSome people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:Please share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #SeeMe and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.
You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page
Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.
 
Thank you so much of all of your love and support!Thanks again,Hailey

story:
Stretch Goal 6 achieved! All our amazing backers can pat themselves on the back and look forward to a SECOND exclusive bonus short story!

 

Stretch Goal 5: Challenge met! That means CF Pilot Cards will become a reality. Look for them in the perks soon! I'm also excited to reveal our 6th Stretch Goal: a second exclusive CFXS short story that all backers will get for free when we hit 700% funded! Claim your perks now & unlock free story 2!

 

Announcing Stretch Goal 5! You've unlocked 4 awesome sets of Combat Frame trading cards. Now get the pilots to man them in battle! Combat Frame XSeed pilot cards enter the arena at 600%! Go get your perks, & get these funded!

 

Stretch Goal 4 Smashed! You guys did it! CFXS card game playtesting is now available in the perks. But slots are limited, so hurry and claim your seat at our table!

 

Time to unveil Stretch Goal 4! You love giant robots. You love action-packed card games. You've got the right stuff to play test the Combat Frame XSeed card game! Play-testing slots will open when we hit 500% funding, so back the campaign, & get in the game!

Stretch Goal 3 met! The Illustrated Combat Frame Tech Guide will now become real! Keep an eye on the campaign for your chance to claim the art book and for our next exciting stretch goal announcement!

 

Announcing Stretch Goal 3! This is one for XSeed history, as our next goal is a full-color vehicle guide showcasing original art & technical stats on every CY-era combat frame! This handsome magazine-sized paperback will be offered to backers when we reach 400% funding. Claim some sweet perks, including the new 4th Series Trading Cards, & unlock the art book!

 

300% funding met! Series 4 trading cards are confirmed and will appear in the perks once today's poll to pick the final card concludes. Stay tuned for the poll results and the unveiling of Stretch Goal 3! This one's gonna be special, so don't miss it!

 

Stretch Goal 2 Unveiled! The 4th series of CFXS trading cards will become available when we reach 300% funding! Head to the Updates to vote for the CFs you want in the next set of cards, and keep contributing to ensure we hit 300%!

 

Exclusive short story confirmed for all backers! Stretch goal 2 TBA soon. Stay tuned for the reveal!

 

Initial goal met in 12 hours! Our first stretch goal, an all-new XSeed short story, has been unlocked! All backers are guaranteed a digital copy of the story when we hit $2000!

 

An unstoppable scourge lays siege to Earth 

Can humanity survive a world-destroying force that has never known defeat?

The Ynzu Siege nears its third bloody decade. Battered to the breaking point, the United Commonwealth-Protectorate recalls its combat frame carrier fleet for a last stand at Earth.

Lt. Dex Trapper must battle for his life when the Ynzu strike his remote extrasolar colony. Cut off from the UCP, Dex and his CF tech Thatch make a desperate break for help in a century-old XSeed.

Fans of J.N. Chaney’s Messenger series and Cole and Anspach’s Galaxy’s Edge will thrill to this new series in Dragon Award winner Brian Niemeier’s XSeed saga! Back it now and take the ride before anyone else!

 

What Readers Said about Combat Frame XSeed: CY 40 Second Coming:

Easily the best giant mech novel I’ve ever read. Niemeier knows what I like and hurls more of it into each successive novel. Can’t wait for the next one.

-Author Adam Lane Smith, author of Maxwell Cain: Burrito Avenger

Everything that I enjoyed from the previous two books is present in a clearer more concentrated form. Niemeier continues to grow more comfortable with the action and intrigues required in a martial thriller, enough to step on the gas and pick up the pace from the already brisk prequels.

More XSeed is on its way, set even further into the future, and, from hints dropped on Niemeier’s blog, it’s a future of war and platypuses. Until then, CY 40 II and its page-turner prequels supply enough heavy metal mecha action to hold readers over.

-The Pulp Archivist

This crazy mfer starts with fixing gundam and doing it better then pivots to Macross meets 40k. Oh boi oh boi

-@EmpReb

 

The Plan

You funded a complete series of awesome XSeed books. I made good on everything I promised and more. That's three epic campaigns funded and tons of sweet perks delivered to satisfied backers!

That was just for starters! Now we kick the blazing mech action into high gear with book 1 in an all-new military sci fi series, Combat Frame XSeed: S!

We are going to crush this.

And we'll do it without corporate publishers telling us how to have fun. I work for you, the reader, and my job is making sure you are entertained!

My track record proves I'm good at bringing you fun. And I work without the safety net of megacorp money.

The only one I rely on to entertain you is YOU!

When you back this project, not only will you help me cover production and marketing costs, you'll get the book before anyone else.

And that's just for starters. It wouldn't be a CFXS campaign without a spectacular selection of awesome perks. So that's just what we've got in store for you!

New to the XSeed saga? No worries! Every perk tier automatically includes the entire first series of 3 Combat Frame XSeed eBooks, plus the digital edition of Combat Frame XSeed: S!

What are you waiting for? Back the project. Claim your ticket. And take the ride!

Back Combat Frame XSeed: S , and spread the word to fellow scifi readers. Indiegogo has share tools to make boosting the signal easy.

Thanks for your support!

Brian

Stay in the Loop

My official newsletter is the best way to keep up-to-date on my books and special projects. 

Sign up and get a FREE book! Plus get the inside track on news about my books, exclusive offers, and specia deals!

Subscription link: https://brianniemeier.us13.list-manage.com/subs...

For the steely eyed mecha men out there, I've got a newsletter just for you! Subscriptions to Nova Frontier, the official UCP Armed Services newspaper, are available in the back of every XSeed digital eition! NF subscribers get the free short story "Combat Frame XSeed: CY 2 Gaiden"--available nowhere else!--and first dibs on XSeed news, deals, and exclusives!

Open that eBook, subscribe now, and get notified of the next campaign before anyone else!

story:
Story of My Book

Chasing Fae is an epic fantasy novel about finding yourself when everything else is against you and learning how to trust after loss.

My name is Cady Hammer, and I am the author of Chasing Fae. I started Chasing Fae midway through my senior year of high school. There was an incident with a group of people, typical high school drama, but I ended up losing contact with a very good friend of mine whom I considered a brother. I was tired of feeling left behind, abandoned, so I decided to take my pain and frustration and turn it into something productive.

Chasing Fae was born out of a need to preserve that sibling-like relationship. But as I began to draft, it became so much more than that. The world came to life, the characters took their first breaths, and I watched a whole new story rise.

My main character, Grace, is an introverted young woman who recharges on her own and tends to keep to herself. But she’s a leader in her own right; when faced with a challenge, she attacks it head-on with a stubborn fierceness that will inspire. The universe that Chasing Fae is set in involves three distinct realms, each with their own appeal. The Upper Realm is Fae and made up of twelve distinct Noble Houses with their own cultures and magical qualities. The Middle Realm is mortal and in a struggle to survive. The Lower Realm is the demon realm, a forbidden space to both mortals and Fae and a land wrapped up in secrets.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will be captivated by the strong protagonist and the fantastic, immersive universe.

Chasing Fae is a young adult fantasy novel and the first of a planned trilogy. You will love this book if you’re a fantasy person, if you’re a fan of work by Sarah J. Maas or Cassandra Clare. If you want to get hooked on a new series, this book is for you. If you’re looking for political intrigue with a side of budding romance, pick up a copy. If you want a fierce introverted leader who takes life into her own hands, Chasing Fae is what you’re looking for.

 

The Book - Chasing Fae

Grace Richardson is a young mortal woman whose only concerns are providing for her family, playing her violin, and spending as much time as possible with her brother, Leo. When Leo goes into service in the Fae’s world as a mercenary, she expects him to return with the honor that he deserves.

When Leo suddenly dies in an unspecified accident, not a word, medal, or penny comes down from the higher ups. Suspecting foul play, Grace disguises herself as a Fae and sneaks into the Upper Realm to get some answers. She anticipated being in way over her head. But did she anticipate a Fae soldier who catches her fleeing an angry bar and discovers her identity only a day in? Not so much.

Now Grace is forced to drag this Fae soldier, Aiden, along as she tries to work out exactly how and why her brother died. Along the way, she has no choice but to confront her prejudices against the Fae as she attempts to sort out the difference between the honest and the dishonest. Political conspiracies, demon realm escapades, and family secrets will all lead Grace to the answers she’s looking for… and some that she isn’t.

 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in July 2020
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this summer!

When I pre-sell 134 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 267 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • And more...

 

About the Author

Cady Hammer is a college student studying history and anthropology at the College of William and Mary. Cady spent much of her childhood coming up with stories and plays to put on with her friends and her younger sister, Morgan. Everything from a story about a girl locked in a tower that she and her friends performed in the sandbox, to Uglydoll stories amid the highest playground structure, and plenty of doll plays with her sister (though Cady will never take credit for the few she came up with; she prefers to let people think Morgan is the only one with the crazy ideas).

She wrote her first novel when she was eleven years old between classes and during her lunch period (a piece of work that will never again see the light of day), and since then, she has been determined to publish a book someday. She constantly toyed around with ideas from contemporary romance to dramatic adventure stories until she finally settled on writing a fantasy novel, which really, she always knew would eventually be her desired genre. Cady Hammer is so excited to bring Chasing Fae to the world, the incredible fantastical culmination of a two-year effort.

For more information you can connect with Cady at cadyahammer@gmail.com, on her website at www.fluffaboutfantasy.com, or on her social media platforms on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, and Pinterest.

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram with your friends, family and network. Please use #ChasingFae and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page
  • Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

 

Thank you so much of all of your love and support!



Best,
Cady Hammer

Cady Hammer is so excited to bring Chasing Fae to the world, the incredible fantastical culmination of a two-year effort.For more information you can connect with Cady at cadyahammer@gmail.com, on her website at www.fluffaboutfantasy.com, or on her social media platforms on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, and Pinterest. Risks & ChallengesThe biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship. Other Ways You Can HelpSome people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram with your friends, family and network. Please use #ChasingFae and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.
You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page
Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.
 Thank you so much of all of your love and support!
Best,Cady Hammer

story:
(Voor de Nederlandstalige uiteenzetting, scrol naar beneden.)

ENGLISH

Who are we?

The book “Fixing My Gaze” saved my life. My name is Michael Lievens. I have been cross-eyed since the age of three and have had a pretty horrible experience dealing with it. The abnormal development of my vision created reading and learning difficulties, fatigue, confusing double vision and functional problems. When reaching out to the medical community, I underwent three strabismus surgeries which actually made things worse! Up until the age of 20, when I finally discovered the book “Fixing My Gaze”, I had never even heard of optometric vision therapy or neuro-visual rehabilitation as a safer and more effective alternative to eye muscle surgery.

Ever since that discovery I’ve been trying to get the word out in order to help other patients. Surgery is not the only treatment option for strabismus or crossed eyes! In the process I’ve started various Dutch and English language websites, appeared in a national Belgian newspaper and was interviewed on the radio about this very subject. More recently, in 2017, some friends and I have set up a Dutch language strabismus patient NGO (Vereniging Der Strabismepatiënten) to inform patients about their treatment options and protect their interests.

Why is this project important?

The book “Fixing My Gaze” contained crucial information that got me through a very difficult period in my life. It provided me with an explanation of why everything had been so difficult up until that point as well as with a scientifically founded reason to believe that vision improvement was still possible.

Unfortunately language barriers are still an issue for many people looking for help and information, certainly those with vision related learning difficulties. I broke through that language barrier and discovered the book just in time but others might not, or might lose valuable time doing so. This is exactly why we need a Dutch version of the book.

Our hope is that people who are familiar with this fabulous book and know about the potential of vision therapy to change lives, are willing to contribute to spreading this knowledge throughout Belgium and the Netherlands.

Remembering my astonishment upon reading “Fixing My Gaze” for the first time, I am positive the translation will have a similarly profound effect on many other people. This book will also dramatically improve the lives of many people by enabling them to make informed decisions about their treatment options. “Fixing My Gaze” will show them the way towards true visual recovery.

What is the money for?

As we are doing all of the translating ourselves, we are able to do this project at a very low rate. Most book translation or publishing projects go for between 10,000 and 20,000 dollars. We are aiming for 3,500 to 4,000 dollars.

About 2/3 of the money obtained through this fundraiser will go to purchasing the Dutch language publishing rights from the American publisher. The remaining 1/3 of the funds will cover other expenses that go into making a finished product such as designing a book cover, hiring a linguist for a final spell and punctuation check, practical costs and marketing. 

The money obtained will not cover the printing of any physical books. The printing costs will be postponed through a “print on demand” formula. This means that once a book is ordered and its payment comes in, only then will the book be printed. That way upfront costs are limited.

In case we exceed our monetary goal, the funds will be used for additional Dutch language initiatives informing parents, patients and the public about noninvasive neuro-visual treatments for strabismus. 

Thank you so much for your support! We cannot express just how much we appreciate it!


NEDERLANDS

Wie zijn we?

Het boek “Fixing My Gaze” heeft mijn leven gered. Mijn naam is Michael Lievens en op de leeftijd van drie jaar ben ik scheel beginnen zien. Het is vreselijk moeilijk geweest om de verregaande gevolgen hiervan de baas te blijven. De abnormale ontwikkeling van mijn zicht leidde tot lees- en leerproblemen, vermoeidheid, verwarrend dubbel zicht en blijvende functionele problemen. Het inroepen van medische hulp leidde tot drie oogspieroperaties die mijn gebrekkige visuele functionaliteit nog  hebben verslechterd. Tot op de leeftijd van 20 jaar, toen ik eindelijk het boek “Fixing My Gaze” van Susan Barry ontdekte, had ik zelfs nog nooit gehoord van visuele therapie of neuro-visuele revalidatie als een veiliger en doeltreffender alternatief voor chirurgie.

Sinds die verbluffende ontdekking heb ik me onafgebroken ingezet om andere patiënten te informeren. Oogspieroperaties zijn niet de enige behandeling voor strabisme of scheelzien! Al doende heb ik verschillende Nederlandstalige en Engelstalige websites opgericht, ben ik in de Belgische krant ‘De Morgen’ verschenen en werd ik over dit onderwerp geïnterviewd op Radio 1. Tot slot hebben enkele lotgenoten en ik in 2017 de Vereniging Der Strabismepatiënten (VDS) opgericht met een tweeledige doelstelling. Enerzijds het aanbieden van informatie die het patiënten mogelijk maakt geïnformeerde beslissingen te nemen en anderzijds het systematisch verdedigen van de belangen van strabismepatiënten.

Waarom is dit project zo belangrijk?

Het boek “Fixing My Gaze” bevat cruciale informatie die me door een zeer moeilijke periode in mijn leven heeft geloodst. Het verschafte een verklaring voor alle moeilijkheden die ik tot dan toe had ondervonden en een wetenschappelijk onderlegde reden om voorzichtig optimistisch te zijn over de toekomst.

Jammer genoeg is het voor veel mensen in hun zoektocht naar informatie en hulp niet vanzelfsprekend de Engelse taalbarrière te overstijgen, zeker niet als oogsamenwerkingsproblemen je leer- en leesvaardigheid belemmeren. Sommigen zullen door de taalbarrière misschien zelfs nooit de waarheid over strabismebehandeling te weten komen of kostbare tijd verliezen. Dit is precies de reden waarom een Nederlandstalige versie van dit boek broodnodig is.

Wij hopen dat sponsors die vertrouwd zijn met dit fantastische boek en met het potentieel van visuele therapie om levens blijvend te veranderen, een kleine bijdrage willen leveren om deze kennis verder te verspreiden in de Lage Landen.

Als ik terugdenk aan hoe versteld ik stond na de eerste lezing van “Fixing My Gaze”, ben ik er zeker van dat de vertaling zijn effect op andere mensen die met scheelzien geconfronteerd worden niet zal missen. Bovendien zal dit  boek  de levens van vele ouders en patiënten substantieel verbeteren door een weloverwogen en geïnformeerde behandelingskeuze mogelijk te maken. Het lezen van “Fixing My Gaze” zal hen de weg naar waarachtig visueel herstel tonen.

Waarvoor dient het geld?

Omdat we al het vertaalwerk zelf doen, zal de investeringskost om een Nederlandse vertaling op de markt te brengen relatief laag zijn. De meeste boek- of vertaalprojecten gaan voor een budget van tussen de 10,000 en 20,000 dollar maar omdat we het project zo goedkoop mogelijk willen realiseren, mikken we op een bedrag van tussen de 3,500 en 4,000 dollar.

Ongeveer 2/3e van het opgehaalde bedrag zal gaan naar het aankopen van de auteursrechten voor het Nederlandse taalgebied. Het resterende geld zal naar de afwerking van het boek gaan: het ontwerpen van de kaft, het inhuren van een taalkundige voor een finale spelling- en interpunctiecontrole, praktische kosten en marketing.

Het opgehaalde bedrag dekt evenwel niet het drukken van de fysieke boeken. De drukkosten worden uitgesteld tot op het moment dat een boek effectief besteld wordt. Dit is de zogenaamde “print on demand” formule. Eens de betaling ervan binnenkomt, wordt het boek gedrukt en geleverd. Op die manier worden voorraadkosten beperkt.

In geval we het vooropgestelde bedrag zouden overschrijden, zullen de bijkomstige middelen gebruikt worden voor aanvullende VDS initiatieven die ouders, patiënten en het grote publiek informeren over het bestaan van non-invasieve, neuro-visuele revalidatie voor scheelzien.

Hartelijk dank voor jullie ondersteuning! We waarderen het enorm!

story:
Story of My Book

My name is Jackson Vines and I am the author of Star-Studded. I wrote this book because I am passionate about sports, baseball specifically, and I want to contribute to the development of the game any way I can. This book has given me an avenue to give my input on the changes we are seeing in the sports world today, such as how we evaluate and value athletes at the highest level of competition.

The world of sports has a small group of individuals who dominate the game they play and our attention, but the way these superstars come about and how we categorize them as such can be explained in a number of ways. This book sheds light on various perspectives of what value top-tier players generate for their teams, as well as the impact they make in and out of the industry.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover a new perspective or way of thinking about how we view elite talent and how we affect their journey to stardom. In this book, I hope to instill the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for the changing landscape of baseball player evaluation in you. Ultimately I want you to use this book to adopt a process of determining what you consider to be a superstar ballplayer by expanding your mindset and discovering what you value in an athlete.

In this book, you'll learn what people outside the sport consider superstar material and what kind of player those inside the sport are currently marketing as superstars. Some examples both parties are valuing currently are:

  • Personality - using charisma as a selling point to fans
  • Youth - bringing a new energy to the game and keeping up with the modern world
  • Diversity - finding unique backgrounds and stories to tell

You will love this book if you love the game of baseball and the unique dynamics that comes with the business of sports.

Star-Studded is a non-fiction book that speaks to casual fans and super fans who are looking at intense analysis and abstract concepts in baseball for the first time.

The Book - Star-Studded

The book is written in seven parts.

The Introduction contains a little about why I wanted to write about this topic and also why I chose to focus a lot on the game of baseball. You’ll learn here a little about my background and why I find myself writing this book specifically. I hope to portray my passion and curiosity that has brought me to embark on this journey.

Part 0 contains a background on the history of data in baseball and the growth of contracts in the sport. This is meant to provide a little bit of precedence for why things are the way they are currently. You will be able to see here how these trends have impacted a sport that has been around as long as baseball has and how transformative they’ve been to the landscape of player evaluation. Some topics to be covered here are the increase of annual player salaries over time, and also the unconventional systems of management that have found success and mainstream popularity.

Part 1 contains pieces tailored to the perspective of fans. Here the reader can take a step back and realize what the audience of sports tends to favor in ballplayers. Being the consumer of sports makes their motivations extremely important for consideration, as they tend to be the driving force in building a player’s superstar status. Some topics to be covered here are different personalities and personal experiences affecting how fans react to certain athletes.

Part 2 contains pieces tailored to the perspective of teammates. Those that spend the most time with potential superstars are very important to the reputation and overall perception of those players. They can either help or hinder one’s journey to the pinnacle of fame, depending on the relationships present. Some topics to be covered here are players being a young, yet mature presence and knowing their role on the team.

Part 3 contains pieces tailored to the perspective of the media. They project messages to get the fans, their audience, to show interest in the player and the sport. Because of this, readers will be able to discover how individuals can be tailored to fit an outlet’s agenda and have their reputation enforced or destroyed in the process. Some topics to be covered here are what we define as greatness and the idea of Superhero Syndrome affecting how we view athletes as people.

Part 4 contains pieces tailored to the perspective of owners. The ones cutting the checks have their own plans for their franchises, and that in turn determines what kind of athletes they feel best accomplishes their goals and satisfies their motivations. Readers should be able to learn how the bosses think and make decisions from this part of the book. Some topics to be covered here are how time has changed business practices in sports and the importance of what I like to call the Three Rs of a successful franchise, and how exactly these things affect the determining of marquee players.

Part 5 contains pieces tailored to the perspective of management. They sit in the middle of most other perspectives mentioned and attempt to please all parties involved in the game. In this section, we will refer back to parts already discussed and see how management balances their responsibilities accordingly. Some topics to be covered here are delivering direct results to owners and creating a versatile product to consumers.

Part 6 contains pieces tailored by my personal perspective on the matter. Here I pull together all that has been covered before to establish a unique take on the topics we’ve discussed up to this point. The reader should be able to draw takeaways from my thought processes and develop their own ideas on the subject matter. Some topics to be covered here are the emergence of unconventional superstars and the development of new abstract categorization models.

 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December 2019
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this Winter

When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish
  • A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share the experiences of writing my book
  • And more...

About the Author

Jackson Vines is an undergraduate student at Texas A&M where he is pursuing a Finance degree with minors in Economics and Sport Management, while also remaining involved in various on-campus service and social organizations.

I wrote this book as a way to explore my curiosity on the enigma of superstar athletes, but also to add something of value to the conversation. The sports world has always been a part of my life and I have a genuine passion to understand it and be a part of it, and this is a way I can be a part of it currently while I continue focusing on my education.

Outside of writing, I enjoy spending my time with family and friends, staying active physically and socially. I have many hobbies and interests I like to pursue when my time allows for it, like golfing or music. I value my faith in God above all else and try to live a life reflective of that.

For more information, you can connect with Jackson at vinesjackson@yahoo.com and on Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter (@JacksonVines_), and Instagram (@jackson_vines).

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #StarStudded and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page
  • Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Jackson Vines

They project messages to get the fans, their audience, to show interest in the player and the sport. Because of this, readers will be able to discover how individuals can be tailored to fit an outlet’s agenda and have their reputation enforced or destroyed in the process. Some topics to be covered here are what we define as greatness and the idea of Superhero Syndrome affecting how we view athletes as people.Part 4 contains pieces tailored to the perspective of owners. The ones cutting the checks have their own plans for their franchises, and that in turn determines what kind of athletes they feel best accomplishes their goals and satisfies their motivations. Readers should be able to learn how the bosses think and make decisions from this part of the book. Some topics to be covered here are how time has changed business practices in sports and the importance of what I like to call the Three Rs of a successful franchise, and how exactly these things affect the determining of marquee players.Part 5 contains pieces tailored to the perspective of management. They sit in the middle of most other perspectives mentioned and attempt to please all parties involved in the game. In this section, we will refer back to parts already discussed and see how management balances their responsibilities accordingly. Some topics to be covered here are delivering direct results to owners and creating a versatile product to consumers.Part 6 contains pieces tailored by my personal perspective on the matter. Here I pull together all that has been covered before to establish a unique take on the topics we’ve discussed up to this point. The reader should be able to draw takeaways from my thought processes and develop their own ideas on the subject matter. Some topics to be covered here are the emergence of unconventional superstars and the development of new abstract categorization models. 
What I Need & What You'll Get
This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December 2019
The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
The Copyediting for My Book - to help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this Winter

When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish
A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share the experiences of writing my book
And more...

About the Author Jackson Vines is an undergraduate student at Texas A&M where he is pursuing a Finance degree with minors in Economics and Sport Management, while also remaining involved in various on-campus service and social organizations.I wrote this book as a way to explore my curiosity on the enigma of superstar athletes, but also to add something of value to the conversation. The sports world has always been a part of my life and I have a genuine passion to understand it and be a part of it, and this is a way I can be a part of it currently while I continue focusing on my education.Outside of writing, I enjoy spending my time with family and friends, staying active physically and socially. I have many hobbies and interests I like to pursue when my time allows for it, like golfing or music. I value my faith in God above all else and try to live a life reflective of that.For more information, you can connect with Jackson at vinesjackson@yahoo.com and on Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter (@JacksonVines_), and Instagram (@jackson_vines). 
Risks & Challenges The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship. 
Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #StarStudded and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.
You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page
Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much of all of your love and support!Thanks again,Jackson Vines

story:
The (Completed) Novel

I have completed a 332 page (109,000 word) novel - it's fiction based on fact - on rather an astounding fact, as it turns out.

The Story

"High science has invaded a deeply conservative Calvinist Bible Belt.  The prince of its youth, backed by his elders, is compelled into conflict with a newcomer; it fractures old alliances and brings turmoil.  A crossroads is reached - fear drives dogma, courage promises redemption."


The Backdrop - the SKA - It's Real*

As you may know, the $2,5-billion Square Kilometre Array (SKA) is shortly due to begin construction - it will be *the biggest scientific infrastructure in the world*.

The objective of the SKA will be to definitively prove the origins of the universe.

Thing is... Though Australia get a minor 20% of the project, the vast majority; 80% of it, is centred on the dusty town of Carnarvon, smack in the heartland of South Africa’s most conservative Calvinist Bible Belt.

  *Did you Know: "The data collected by the SKA in a single day would take nearly two million years to playback on an iPod." - #SKAnovel

When Worlds Collide - It Could Happen

Now, this struck me as a great irony; that the two worlds – dogmatic, unshakeable faith and extreme science, both presuming to answer the same fundamental question about our existence, will shortly cohabit the same piece of turf.
Wow!

I asked myself some intriguing questions:

  • "What would happen if the local pastor took offense?"
  • "What if the citizens decided to oppose it?"
  • "What if there was something bigger than them steering this objection?"
You'll appreciate that these backwaters of South Africa still suffer a hangover from Apartheid and deeply ingrained bigotry.  Now, into this mix will come scienitsts and their families - not all of them will be white...
This has 'powder keg' potential, I realized.

The Story - Imagine

You’ll want front row seats when the plucky, black-skinned, son of an ethnically Indian father; an Oxford Professor of Evolutionary Biology; and CalTech AstroPhysicist mother, starts day-1 in a deeply Calvinist, Post-Apartheid, Bible Belt school – a school where the ill-tempered town Preacher doubles as Life-Orientation and Guidance Counselor.

The world's finest scientific minds, with their families, are winging on down to build this vast new telescope, due for completion in 2026.
  • With the SKA, they declare that they’ll finally know the precise origins of the universe and how it evolved.
  • Thing is, they’re doing this right in the middle of a town that has more churches than ATMs!  A town that's populated by some of the hardest-nosed people on the planet... folk who already know where the universe comes from; and it offends them in their deepest sentiments.

If that's not explosive enough, consider that wealthy US based Christian Apologetic and other Evangelical Ministries might throw their considerable support into the mix... And I'll say no more on that, for fear of spoiling the plot.

Break out the popcorn and join me in the adventure as we discover some things about them, about us, and about… well… the SKA, and, much, much else.  You’ll be surprised what you may witness and learn.

I promise - it's a hell of a read...

But can I write...? And, how interesting can I make a book like this? ...Hey... why not have a read for a few pages...

 > Chapter 1 - extract

... and... for no particular reason (other than it doesn't give much plot away :-) ... arbitrarily...

  > Chapter 9 extract 

*****

What I Need & What You Get

This is a great story with Best Seller potential.  It's not just an exciting thriller, it's packed with scientific information delivered in a simple and interesting format, with vexing human questions about how we see ourselves, how we see one another, and what we must get past in order to get along.  It truly is a vast sweep of topics in a single book:

  • The book is written and in edit - every penny collected will go into marketing it.
  • I've told the story, but I want to include your views - So... come on, have your say: Look at our various funding options that guarantee that I'll send you a draft and then include your arguments for or against any aspects in the book that you feel is wrong or needs consideration.  These inputs will be end-noted with your name and even the actual questions or observations that you made.
  • Every penny of funds will go into promotion - to make this book a Best Seller
Apart from mass market appeal, the book is highly appealing to both sides of the religious / atheist debate.

    The Impact You Can Help Make

    A very religious friend just finished my first draft - here's what she says:

    "I think your novel is compelling, exciting and fast paced. It’s relevant highlighting the 21stcentury clash between superstition and knowledge. Its chilling the depths people will go to protect and justify their beliefs and bigotry. I loved the mounting tension you build throughout the narrative.
    I found myself unsettled by the fragility or façade of relationships when one doesn’t conform and the destructiveness of those terrified of change and progress, the gullibility of man and allowing ourselves to be exploited.
    You write so intelligibly on such a wide variety of topics that I have no doubt everyone that reads your novel will find light thrown on something they didn’t know.
    I personally appreciate that you have written very matter of factly without showing massive amounts of disdain towards the religious and your restraint is admirable"

    Through Facebook I requested readers - a litterary critic responded from England - here's her synopsis after she read the book:

    "Story and everything about it is excellent! Characters are well rounded.  I cannot help but think these are all people you know or have had relations with in all capacities.  Please stay in contact it is such a great story and I'll love to know how it goes."


    • Our era is marked by a schism - a polarization between religions and growing enmity between fundamentalist religions and science.  This novel is a building block to allow each side to see another point of view - and, it's a hell of a good read.
    • Research my name, Michael Smorenburg at Amazon - in the late '90s I wrote and sold (Career Press & Adams Media) 3 "How To" books.  I own www.VoiceAlert.co.za, and I recently co-produced a documentary Behind Paradise - you'll see my name in the opening and closing credits.
    • Inbox me and I'll send you a few chapters to see if I've 'got it'.

    The Zero Risks or Challenges

    There is no risk - the book is written - all funds go into making it as good as can be, and marketing the heck out of it till it's a Best Seller.

    • Amazon's KDP (Kindle Direct Publishing - give this video a watch if you're unfamiliar with it) program guarantees that this book will be commercially available.
    • That's e-book taken care of - how about print, you ask...?
      Please see CreateSpace - it's all taken care of.
    • I am very well versed in all social media, I have vast email lists and online/Twitter/FB, etc groups identified, with well crafted pitch letters for each segment ready to drum up interest.
    • I have a thorough launch and sustainable marketing program ready to go.
    • I have the bones of a sequel ready to go.

    I'd Be Grateful for Help

    Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

    • Even if you can't help with a small donation, please do share this campaign
    • Indiegogo make it so easy to share - please click the buttons.

story:
Each day learn the name of a different person in the Bible! 

 WHAT'S MY NAME? The Calendar 2015

The Story of the Calendar

The Mission

To reach out to the family and friend unit and share the truths of the Bible, opening 

the door through the vehicle of games, so we can reconnect with God. 

To encourage Bible reading and an appreciation for all the contributing

 characters in the greatest story ever told.

 The Overview

What's My Name? - The Bible Game,  a product of Gospel Games Network,

was created by Karen Hodge for her grandchildren during their morning commute to school. 

She developed a technique to help them learn about the people in the Bible in a fun way. 

They loved it and her granddaughter, Sydnii said  "Gran, you should make this into a game for other people to play.”

The rest is history in the making. 

That concept grew out of a verbal trivia based game... to a card game ...and two board games ...then a Blog ...a Facebook Q&A game with daily posts ...a  twice annual international competition -WMN Summer and Winter Olympic Games ...a Book, “What’s My Name? - Vignettes of Seventy Incredible Bible Characters” ...and now  the release of“What’s My Name? -The Calendar (2015)”

We've taken What's My Name? all around and introduced it at  Bible studies, house parties, family get-togethers, picnics, on road trips and the like and it's never failed to entertain!

The Aim

The aim of What's My Name? is to introduce the people in the Scriptures in a relevant, modern, entertaining way. The reality is that we've made the process exciting and fun.

Our objective is to use games to help others cultivate a relationship with God.  We want to encourage people to pick up their Bibles and explore history from a different perspective and learn that the stories of the Bible aren't fables, but rather important object lessons centered around the very real people they showcase. 

This is our ministry and our passion to reach the masses, bring family and friends back together, all through incorporating games.  


What We Need & What You Get

We set our goal at $1000. as a minimum needed to print both the Wall Calendar and the Desk Calendar versions in bulk. If our funding results are lower we will  print a smaller initial quantity and reduce our inventory on hand accordingly.  That simply means more frequent print runs which will not impact the quality. The Calendars will be printed in full color on premium quality stock here in the US by a top quality printer.  

Those pledging at  Levels One and TWO will receive their gift as a  download to be printed according to their preferences. Would you like to know who's mentioned on your birthday, or who's mentioned on any other day? - leave a comment/question and we'll look it up and let you know.

We've selected premium  card stock on which to print the individual  pages which will be highlighted with the special day you've chosen. 

These pages are personalized and ready for framing & make unique one-of-a-kind gifts - tailor made for the recipient. Imagine - your special month from  What's My Name? The Calendar 2015 showing all the Bible characters featured in that month - and a bright star highlighting YOUR  special day (birthday, anniversary, milestone in your life you'd like to commemorate, etc.). These gifts are only available here! 



If we exceed our goal we'll introduce stretch goals enabling us to offer extras like free shipping, gift boxes, buttons, postcards, etc. (We're open to suggestions!)

The Impact

We've been playing the What's My Name Game on Facebook for 2 years and have had great fun in daily introducing and reintroducing thousands of fans to the Incredible Bible Characters that are mentioned in the Bible, What's My Name? The Calendar 2015 is another vehicle that will add a tangible dimension to the daily reminder of who these people are.  It will also be a colorful aid in Bible study efforts.

Risks & Challenges

The only challenge we foresee (which might affect turn-around time) and could result in shipping delays would be weather related.  This, however would probably be limited only to days  and not be insurmountable.   We have back-up systems in place should this occur.  We guarantee that every pledge will be fulfilled! 

Other Ways You Can Help

We're asking you to share our campaign with your friends and contacts especially if you're a fan of the Bible or Bible games, or want to become one.

 Help us spread the word by sharing our Indiegogo direct link:              

http://igg.me/at/WMN-2015calendar 

 also join us at : www.facebook.com/WhatsMyNameGame to play the game with us.



Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools as well!
