story:
An Authentic Derivative by Caleb Coy is now available to purchase on Amazon!

Click HERE to order!


In a world where overeducated millennials struggle to live lives of authenticity and meaning without pretension...

Uprising indie rocker Garrett Sedgwick has been described as “an over-reflective, hyper-self-ware, ungrateful artist, garrulous about his own craft.” Known for his “mercurial flexibility” and “intrepid penchant for mimicry,” the reclusive wunderkind struggles to assert his own identity among a sectarian fan base who trades rumors about his promotional stunts like currency.

Cynical graphic designer Neil Oberlin has moved to Nashville as one of many over-educated millennials trying to craft authentic lives for themselves. When he gets hold of a ticket to see Sedgwick live, our supercilious narrator is reluctantly thrust into a quest to design the perfect album cover.

However, Neil’s proximity to the brooding, fickle musician is compounding his own anxieties. Armed with an obsequious vocabulary, our narrator must plumb through an indefinite malaise. For Neil Oberlin, things are about to get awkward.

An Authentic Derivative is an odyssey into the shifting, conflicting scenes of a generation caught rolling its eyes at any attempt to define itself.


READ A PREVIEW!
I've released the first seven pages of the novel as a pdf for you to try for FREE!
Click HERE.
I've also released an interview with the protagonist, Garrett Sedgwick!
Click HERE.


Who's the author? What's he like?

  • "Is this your first novel?"
    This will be my first published novel. Ask me if I've been published.
  •  "Have you ever been published?"
    Yes. Essays, articles, short stories, and poems. Most recently my personal essay, "Vultures," was published by Connotation Press.
  • "Do you have a blog?"
    I do. You can check me out at calebcoy.wordpress.com, where I blog weekly on language, literature, and spirituality.
  • "Who are you, anyway?"
    I'm a 20-something white male Christian millennial southern/suburban Virginian who went to a Christian university, married a mountain girl, is raising an outrageous toddler, and teaches English near the West Virginia border.
  • "How do you have time to write a novel?"
    I don't. Until summer. Teacher, remember? This novel is the culmination of 3 summers of passionate work.
  • "Why don't you find a publishing house?"
    Have you been to Barnes and Noble lately? Publishing has changed. My book is a niche book; I'm not pursuing mainstream publishers. It is also in the spirit of the narrator, who hates branding and conglomerates, for me to publish his narrative myself, the way he would have wanted.

How Does Your Funding Contribute?

  • The basic funding covers the costs of production. The novel is already written revised, and edited, but the funds cover 1) cover art 2) publish-ready formatting 3) eBook conversion, and, once released, 4) promotion.
  • Your funding also wins you perks! Depending on how much you give, you'll receive updates on production, teasers from the novel, behind-the-scenes videos, a promotional Garrett Sedgwick concert ticket, or even a personal interview with our author!

The Impact of Funding the Novel

The publishing world is changing. Others have made the shift, not only to publishing fiction as e-books, but crowdfunding them.

  • My novel represents itself as a created work, but it also represents what authors and reader communities can do together.
  • By backing my novel, you are not only purchasing the novel, but investing in an indie art form. You're supporting an author who not only wrote, but designed, packaged, and promoted his own novel. It's like supporting a small business.
  • Your commitment to the creative project determines its success. You can fund the minimum ($2 for eBook) and still experience the novel in its entirety. You can fund more and dive more "in-depth."

Yes, it is a risk.

I'll be plain and simple: I am asking you to invest at least $2 toward a literary work. Remember three things:

  • The funding is all-or-nothing, meaning that if I do not raise enough to meet my goal, everyone gets their money back.
  • The novel is already written. Most people who try to write a novel quit before they are halfway through the first draft. I've not only written, but revised, edited, and tested my novel with a focus group.
  • Your investment gains you an inside look into the writing and production of the novel. How many novelists grant readers such a privilege?
    (Here are examples of novels successfully done this way: Mytro by John Biggs, Janaina by Lorelei Williams, Missing Steps by Paul Cavanagh)

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Get the word out! Do you have a blog? Facebook? Twitter? Use your social media to let others know of my book.
  • Use the IndieGoGo share tools. They will direct attention back to this page, where others can invest.
  • When the book is published, I encourage you to write a review on Amazon, or even on your own blog.
  • Get the word about the indie artist Garrett Sedgwick. Make it seem like he's a real musician nobody has heard of. This is an experiment in viral marketing.

I'm excited to publish a novel in this new way, using the backing of a reading community. Will the old way of writing novels change, or will it stay the same? This experience is one of many that will determine the future of novel writing. I hope you get a chance to be part of the experience!

story:
Som Catalunya. Somos España



El Día de la Constitución nos manifestamos a favor de la convivencia entre los catalanes y de los catalanes con el resto de los españoles. Ayúdanos a hacer historia. ¡Colabora! 

"Som Catalunya-Somos España" ha organizado para el viernes, 6 de diciembre, una manifestación que saldrá a las 12.00 horas de la Plaza de Urquinaona de Barcelona y finalizará en la Plaza de Sant Jaume en donde se leerá un manifiesto

El último 12 de octubre convocamos a miles de personas en el centro de Barcelona. La movilización ciudadana del próximo Día de la Constitución debe representar una nueva muestra de unidad por parte de los catalanes que también nos sentimos españoles. La Constitución española de 1978 cumple 35 años. Durante ese tiempo, España ha vivido el período más democrático y civilizado de su historia. Todo, por supuesto, es susceptible de mejorar pero sólo JUNTOS podremos superar la adversidad, reforzar la democracia y garantizar nuestra pluralidad civil y territorial. En esa tarea, los españoles tienen que ser los verdaderos protagonistas y, por ello, reclamamos nuestro derecho a participar activamente, como sociedad civil

Para hacerlo posible necesitamos de tu colaboración, en forma de donativo, para:

  • Demostrar  que una gran mayoría de catalanes  deseamos mantener nuestro vínculo y seguir conviviendo con  el resto de los españoles.
  • Contar con una buena campaña de comunicación y difusión para hacer posible que todo el mundo conozca  este evento.
  • Reafirmar el poder de los ciudadanos, organizados de forma independiente y financiando sus actividades por sí mismos.

Necesitamos tu ayuda

  • Para financiar los gastos de la organización del evento (pancartas, escenario, sonido, seguridad…)  y de elaboración de la página web de “Som Catalunya-Somos España”.
  • La totalidad de los fondos obtenidos se destinarán a sufragar los gastos de la plataforma "Som Catalunya- Somos España".

También puedes contribuir de las siguientes maneras:

No queremos  que las actuales circunstancias económicas condicionen tu posible contribución al éxito de la manifestación. Por eso,  tanto si puedes aportar  tu donativo como si no, te proponemos que:

  • Difundas nuestra campaña de financiación entre tus contactos. Mientras más personas se enteren, mayor será la probabilidad de alcanzar la cifra requerida.
  • Compartas los enlaces, videos, imágenes y todo el material promocional que conseguirás adjunto en esta misma página.
  • Asistas junto con tu familia y amigos a la manifestación del 06/12/13 bajo el lema:


Junts! Per un futur democràtic i plural


¡Juntos! Por un futuro democrático y plural

story: N/A

A Hundred Poems About Flowers - the next twenty-five

Your support of this campaign will create a rich addition to our cultural celebrations (and contemplations) of flowers, nature, gardening and gardeners. Through  poetry, paintings and sound, A Hundred Poems About Flowers - the next twenty-five will explore common cottage garden flowers and indigenous wildflowers. 
As the project's poet and creator I write of flowers to bear witness. To contemplate the experiences of gardening. To celebrate wildflowers and reflect on a time when they were familiar and common even in farmland. 
In the process this project also sometimes offers notes on Nature as we're allowing it to be erased without a peep of protest: certain of these poems are hymns to wild blooms which even as I write are falling to Development. 

In the Beginning...

Flowers kick-started my collaboration as a poet with gifted painters on a project called A Hundred Poems About Flowers. Together we're exploring the wonders & quirks of our human relationship with blossoms of all kinds. We're doing this through 4 public exhibitions of paintings, poem text, and poem audio, which we then publish as full-colour illustrated books and audio cds.


Two years ago exhibit one & book one: A Hundred Poems About Flowers - the first twenty-five  came off beautifully. Visual artists for this first in a series of four books were Oxford County painter Rita Milton and Woodstock, Ontario landscape painter Cathy Groulx. The month-long exhibition took place at the Ingersoll Creative Arts Centre (Ontario) followed by the publication of book one.


The first exhibit and book came about through contributions (many in-kind) from over a dozen individuals. Other resources were generously supplied by community organizations who saw the worth in what began as a very "local" project. In the process we we discovered that because flowers are universal, our "local" project quickly proved itself valuable to anyone, anywhere.


What We Need & What You Get

Your financial support will go directly to the production costs of A Hundred Poems About Flowers - the next twenty-five  - 

  • photographing the twenty-five paintings for the book 
  • the creation of audio kits for exhibit visitors to listen to while they stroll through the exhibit and admire the artwork 
  • exhibit mounts 
  • sound engineering 
  • gallery rental 
  • printing of the full-colour illustrated poetry book


Even if we don't meet our financial goal of $3500, all proceeds will greatly assist to offset production costs. 

On the sidebar you'll see a list of perks you receive as contributor to this campaign.

We recognize that funds are tight - especially among artists - and would appreciate it if you shared this campaign on your social media sites.


Who We Are


Robyn Marie Butt, Poet & Project Creator

A frequent national poetry competition award winner, Robyn Marie Butt’s audio dramas have won honours & awards both nationally and internationally. As author, culture critic and creative essayist her work has appeared in many magazines, earning National Magazine Award and Journey Prize nominations. Robyn is also the author of the short story collection Seasons of Ordinary Time, an editor with Boularderie Island Press and a member of The Writer's Union of Canada. She resides in Oxford County, Ontario.


Adriana Rinaldi, Painter

Adriana Lives in Oakville, Ontario where she paints full time.  Floral paintings provide her greatest joy and satisfaction, yet whatever the subject, medium or style Adriana is a dedicated and passionate painter who invests great skill into each of her works. Though fairly recently begun her art career after a long career in the business world, her paintings have been shown in public exhibitions, international publications, and in juried shows.


Gaby Tutak, Painter

Gabby continues her journey to develop vibrant works in acrylics, oils and printmaking. Landscapes, florals, café scenes and interiors capture unique light and colour to evoke rich images. Her yearly exhibits in Toronto and Mississauga are enthusiastically received and original works have found permanent homes in Canada, U.S.A. and Europe.


Audio and narration of video provided by Soundpark Studios. [Note: video narration is not by the poet, who will however be recorded for the project's other audio components.]


Thank you for supporting this campaign!



May Apple

[from A Hundred Poems About Flowers - the next twenty-five]


Show me the flower of heart's success

when brain only wants to be loved

  shy white parachute, still,

in the fork of opposing stems.


  On slender arched neck

head leans to earth and hidden roots

whispers Love me

to ground. A bloom must be

for fruit to follow.


And dying into loam

rest at the spent fulfilling

of seeds

  thank those white determined petals

for being just as strong as necessary.


                                               - Robyn Marie Butt

Even if we don't meet our financial goal of
$3500, all proceeds will greatly assist to offset production costs. 
On the sidebar you'll see a list of perks you receive as contributor to this campaign.We recognize that funds are tight - especially among artists - and would appreciate it if you shared this campaign on your social media sites.

Who We Are

Robyn Marie
Butt, Poet & Project Creator
A frequent national poetry competition award winner, Robyn Marie Butt’s 
audio dramas have won honours & awards both nationally and 
internationally. As author, culture critic and creative essayist her 
work has appeared in many magazines, earning National Magazine Award and
 Journey Prize nominations. Robyn is also the author of the short story collection Seasons of Ordinary Time, an editor with Boularderie Island Press and a member of The Writer's Union of Canada. She resides in Oxford County, Ontario.

Adriana Rinaldi, PainterAdriana Lives in Oakville, Ontario where she paints full time.  Floral paintings provide her greatest joy and satisfaction, yet whatever the subject, medium or style Adriana is a dedicated and passionate painter who invests great skill into each of her works. Though fairly recently begun her art career after a long career in the business world, her paintings have been shown in public exhibitions, international publications, and in juried shows.Gaby Tutak,
Painter


Gabby continues her 
journey to develop vibrant works in acrylics, oils and printmaking. Landscapes, 
florals, café scenes and interiors capture unique light and colour to evoke rich images. Her yearly exhibits 
in Toronto and Mississauga are enthusiastically received and original works have found 
permanent homes in Canada, U.S.A. and Europe.Audio and narration of video provided by Soundpark Studios. [Note: video narration is not by the poet, who will however be recorded for the project's other audio components.]
Thank you for supporting this campaign!




May Apple
[from A Hundred Poems About Flowers - the next twenty-five]

Show me the flower of heart's success
when brain only wants to be loved
  shy white
parachute, still, 
in the fork of opposing stems.
  On slender
arched neck
head leans to earth and hidden roots
whispers Love me
to ground. A bloom must be
for fruit to follow.
And dying into loam
rest at the spent fulfilling
of seeds
  thank those
white determined petals
for being just as strong as necessary.


                                               - Robyn Marie Butt

“Gutsche nails it with this book. He’ll teach you neurological habits that can accelerate your success and make you into a fire-breathing, game-changing innovator of epic proportions.”
- Guy Kawasaki, Former Chief Evangelist of Apple, Chief Evangelist of Canva and bestselling author of The Art of Social Media

"Jeremy Gutsche’s latest book is a gem. Using a wealth of research and an array of great stories, he shows you how find avoid the traps that inhibit your progress. Then he shows you smart, useful tools to help you find breakthrough ideas better and faster.”
- Daniel H. Pink, NY Times bestselling author of TO SELL IS HUMAN and DRIVE

“Better and Faster is an epic method for all those who want to become better at innovating, managing and adapting. Stop missing out on your hidden potential, harness your hunter instincts and learn Gutsche’s 6 shortcuts to remarkable opportunity”
- Josh Linkner, NY Times bestselling author of Road to Reinvention, Venture Capitalist


LEARN MORE & SEE MORE SPECIALS @ http://www.BetterAndFaster.com




** NOTE on timelines

1. TREND REPORTS & EXPLOITING CHAOS - December, pretty much within a day of the campaign ending

2. ASSESSMENT - This is the only part not yet perfect, so hopefully January

3. GALLEYS - Those eligible in CAN/USA will get a FREE galley in January

4. HARDCOVER BOOK - March! :)



THE STORY IN 6 SLIDES:

1. Your life is the outcome of hundreds of choices that you make. Each choice takes you and your team to a slightly different version of your potential


2. Today, in an era of unprecedented chaos and opportunity, you could be more successful at innovating, adapting and investing, but it is difficult to filter down to find your optimal path


3. Unfortunately, your potential is inhibited by neurological traps and organizational structure. These traps cause most people to miss out on their true potential, interestingly, those with talent or success are hindered the most.


4. This book will make you BETTER by teaching you how these traps work and the habits you can encourage in yourself and your team to better realize your potential.

5. Then it will make you FASTER by teaching you how to use 6 patterns of opportunity that Trend Hunter has learned from studying 250,000 ideas using 100,000,000 people who have visited our site.


6. And of course, because it is Trend Hunter, the stories are AWESOME. You will learn lessons about thinking FASTER and BETTER from rocket ships, gangster gardeners, bootleggers, reclusive billionaires, retro video games, ugly dolls, ex criminals, and ordinary people that made it incredibly big.




In our world of chaos and change, what breakthroughs are you overlooking? How close are you to realizing your potential? 

This book will make you BETTER by teaching you how to overcome the neurological traps that block smart teams and successful people, like you, from realizing full potential. Then, it will make you FASTER by teaching you  6 patterns of opportunity. Shortcuts we've learned from advising 300 of the world's most innovative companies and from our study of 250,000 ideas and 100,000,000 people.

Each pattern you’ll learn is a repeatable shortcut that has created fortunes for ex-criminals, reclusive billionaires, disruptive CEOs and ordinary people who unexpectedly made it big.

Then, the Trend Hunter team will directly help you find YOUR NEXT BIG IDEA, by hooking you up with our last award-winning book, FREE research and even custom reports, depending on how many books you order.
http://www.BetterandFaster.com


$25 Book Package (Worth $75)

Each Better & Faster package includes a full package of extras:

1. BETTER & FASTER - The Proven Path to Unstoppable Ideas - Get the HARD COVER book delivered March 17, and before that, get a 3,700 word digital preview in December, along with your other free extras.

2. EXPLOITING CHAOS - 150 Ways to Spark Innovation During Times of Change - Get a digital version of our award-winning innovation book, Exploiting Chaos, winner of the Inc Magazine Best Books for Business Owners, CEO Read #1 Most Popular, Axiom International Book Award Winner.

3. EDUCATIONAL KEYNOTE VIDEO - Get inspired with a high-energy, exciting video of the BETTER & FASTER concepts. Great as an introduction or a refresher.

4. BETTER & FASTER ASSESSMENT - Learn the extent to which you are held back by each of the farmer traps, and how you compare to your own organization.

5. POWERPOINT TAKEAWAYS & TACTICAL FRAMEWORKS - Get downloadable frameworks and lessons used in both EXPLOITING CHAOS & BETTER & FASTER.

6. GIFT PAGE - All of your extras will be included on a gift page, making it the perfect gift for your teammate, significant other, entrepreneurial buddy, kid, etc.

Top 5 ways to use your new RESEARCH perks!

1. SCOPE A NEW BUSINESS IDEA - If you have ever wanted to scope out an entrepreneurial venture or new product, this is an awesome way to leverage our top-tier advisors to help you find better ideas, faster.

2. ENHANCE YOUR TEAM'S SUCCESS - Get professional level tools and research to enhance your business, without the usual cost.

3. INSPIRE A FRIEND, KID or COLLEAGUE WITH THE PERFECT GIFT - Get a digital book package as a holiday stocking stuffer for your team!

4. PLOT YOUR NEXT CAREER - Use our research to find market opportunity and the book as your road map to finding your big breakthrough!

5. JOIN TOP TIER INNOVATORS LIKE NESTLE, SAMSUNG & TARGET - With our custom research, reports and the book, you can get the same tools we've been using for years with some of the world's top innovators (without the normal hefty price.)

6. STOP MISSING OUT - This book is literally about helping you to better realize all those ideas that are so close within your grasp, yet so frequently overlooked. It will make you a better innovator, investor, manager and maybe even parent by teaching you the neurological traps that cause smart people and successful teams to miss out, and it will give you a road map of 6 key patterns that will lead you to bigger, better ideas, faster.


** CLIENT UPGRADE:
If you are already one of our clients and you elect to buy the 100 book package, we will upgrade your CUSTOM REPORTS to be reports with 24 hour turnaround, which you can use any time in the next year.  :)




THE BACKGROUND STORY

150,000 Hunters + 100,000,000 Visitors + 350 Clients = A More Proven Path to Unstoppable Ideas


1. CONTEXT: WE HELP PEOPLE FIND BETTER IDEAS FASTER
Trend Hunter is on a crowd-sourced, crowd-filtered mission to help people "Find Better Ideas Faster."  As a giant community of curious and creative people around the world, we've had the ability to study ideas in a very unique way that was never before possible.  Imagine having 150,000 people hunting ideas for you and a 100,000,000 person focus group.   In short, this book represents millions of dollars of research and nearly 7 years of work with our global team and work advising several hundred brands from Samsung and Nestle to Adidas and Victoria's Secret.


2. A CAREER STUDYING IDEAS & THE HISTORY OF TREND HUNTER
I spent my life searching for a business idea that I could call my own.After decades of searching, I still didn't have that idea, but I had become an expert helping OTHER people find their inspiration.  In my mad quest to find an opportunity, I'd become one of the youngest business directors and innovation leads at a bank, where I eventually grew my business line into a $1 billion portfolio of market leading products.  That sounds great, but for me, the corporate success was a glowing reminder that I hadn't solved my entrepreneurial goal. So, I started a crowd sourced website where people from around the world could share business ideas.  I thought that someone, somewhere, would share an idea that could inspire my great idea.  In the years that followed, I am humbled and grateful that Trend Hunter exploded into something much larger with 2 BILLION pageviews, millions of fans and 100,000,000 visitors, each teaching us about the future.



3. WHAT HAPPENED AFTER EXPLOITING CHAOS (WRITTEN IN 2008)
In 2008, I wrote a book called Exploiting Chaos which won a number of business awards (Inc Magazine Best Books for Business Owners, Axiom International Book Award - Gold Medal, CEO Read #1 Most Popular, etc).   Published a year later, the book turned out to be a pretty timely read as the world entered a 6 year period of chaos and uncertainty that we are still a part of.  This expertise led me to become an advisor for about 350 brands, billionaires and a lot of CEOs who wanted to help their teams better navigate chaos and change.  By helping those companies during their most difficult periods of change, my team has had a remarkable opportunity to battle test and prove our approach to change and adaptation.  We've been through a lot of companies in their periods of change and we know these methods will help your team adapt and find better ideas faster.


** NOTE: You'll get all of the Exploiting Chaos extras free, with any of the book packages.


In short, we want to help accelerate your potential and teach you how to see all those close ideas that you are overlooking. We want to make you BETTER & FASTER, which will take your game to the next level:

story:
Who We Are, Why We're Here

We are two self-employed Astrologers on the verge of... something big. 

Something very big. 

And very personal. 

But we are sharing it here because, well, we announced our engagement on our respective Facebook pages and everyone asked where the registry was. 

Registry? Huh? 

I'm not your typical bride. Eek!

Marriage license: done. 

Wedding date selected: done. 

This Is Really Happening Freak-Out: IN PROGRESS.

:)

I'm 43. Never married.

For those astrologers out there reading this, I have a Moon Pluto conjunction in my First House and a *very* lone wolf chart. 

I thought love was out of the question for me. 

And I talk and write to clients every day who believe love and commitment is out of the question for them too. 

But I'm here to tell you that it's not. Miracles happen. And then the hard work begins :)

We met on line. Talked for a few years and finally met in person this summer and... here we are. Starting a new life together. 

Do we need stuff? 

Yeah we need stuff. Basic stuff. 

We've each been alone a long time and come from small families. 

We're getting married at the courthouse with one witness, him in his best jeans and black t-shirt and me searching for a dress that's perfectly me. 

Indiegogo has some great prompts here. I love this one: "Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve."

Contributers will allow us to... exhale. They, you, will give us a freedom that we wouldn't otherwise have.

The money here will feed us and feed our work and thus our service to our clients will get even stronger, better. 

Where is the money going? 

-Security deposit, first month's rent on new apartment (yep we need to move)

-Furniture 

-Household items for bed, bath, and home office (including new computer)

-Honeymoon :) 

And, by the way, I listed this campagin under WRITING (nothing quite fit) because we are bloggers/ writers and any exhalation time from the daily-do will likely be spent doing just that.

Matthew has a book in his bonnet (actually more than one), and if you know writers then you know their ideal world is coffee, a computer, and peace. 

Your gift could help give us that peace.

story:
Short Summary

In 1994, Nelson Peery, a veteran of the Second World War, published a hard-hitting autobiography called Black Fire: The Making of an American Revolutionary. It won critical acclaim because it told the truth about what it was like to be a young Black man in America during the Great Depression and then fight in a segregated army. Peery wrote the book because he wanted to show how people become revolutionary from their life experience, and the conclusions they come to about what must be done to make America live up to its promise.

When Nelson Peery spoke at bookstores or was interviewed by journalists, he was bombarded with questions. He was asked to comment on events since World War II—on international politics, on the role of race in American life, the role of young people in the fight for a new society, and many other issues. So, in 2002 he wrote another book on those subjects, The Future Is Up to Us: A Revolutionary Talking Politics With the American People.

The Future Is Up to Us contains many insights, some great personal stories, and vividly conveys the author's heartfelt certainty that the human race can do away with exploitation, creating a new world where everyone can lead a happy, fulfilling life. When The Future Is Up to Us first came out, it was read and discussed by many people involved in the fight for a new society. It sparked some lively debates and made people think. We need more debate  and more critical thinking in this country today. You can help make that happen.

Even thirteen years after its initial release, The Future Is Up To Us is more timely than ever—yet it is out of print. We want to reprint Future for a new generation of revolutionaries that has joined the movement, and we need your help to do it. 

What We Need & What You Get
  • We are aiming for $5,000 to cover the cost of reprinting of The Future is Up To Us, and the shipping costs to send it to each of our backers.
  • We also have limited availability perks including signed books and the opportunity to meet and talk face-to-face with Nelson.
  • You can preorder the book for yourself or a friend, order it in bulk, as well as get it bundled it with Nelson's memoirs Black Fire and Black Radical.
  • All perks over $25 include a historic photo of Nelson Peery speaking from a soap box in Harlem.

         

  • The cost of shipping is already included for each perk.
(There may be additional shipping costs for international orders.)
story_txt:
Short Summary In 1994, Nelson Peery, a veteran of the Second World War, published a hard-hitting autobiography called Black Fire: The Making of an American Revolutionary. It won critical acclaim because it told the truth about what it was like to be a young Black man in America during the Great Depression and then fight in a segregated army. Peery wrote the book because he wanted to show how people become revolutionary from their life experience, and the conclusions they come to about what must be done to make America live up to its promise.When Nelson Peery spoke at bookstores or was interviewed by journalists, he was bombarded with questions. He was asked to comment on events since World War II—on international politics, on the role of race in American life, the role of young people in the fight for a new society, and many other issues. So, in 2002 he wrote another book on those subjects, The Future Is Up to Us: A Revolutionary Talking Politics With the American People.
The Future Is Up to Us contains many insights, some great personal stories, and vividly conveys the author's heartfelt certainty that the human race can do away with exploitation, creating a new world where everyone can lead a happy, fulfilling life. When The Future Is Up to Us first came out, it was read and discussed by many people involved in the fight for a new society. It sparked some lively debates and made people think. We need more debate  and more critical thinking in this country today. You can help make that happen.
Even thirteen years after its initial release, The Future Is Up To Us is more timely than ever—yet it is out of print. We want to reprint Future for a new generation of revolutionaries that has joined the movement, and we need your help to do it. 
What We Need & What You Get
 
We are aiming for $5,000 to cover the cost of reprinting of The Future is Up To Us, and the shipping costs to send it to each of our backers.
We also have limited availability perks including signed books and the opportunity to meet and talk face-to-face with Nelson. You can preorder the book for yourself or a friend, order it in bulk, as well as get it bundled it with Nelson's memoirs Black Fire and Black Radical.
All perks over $25 include a historic photo of Nelson Peery speaking from a soap box in Harlem.

         

The cost of shipping is already included for each perk.
(There may be additional shipping costs for international orders.)

story:
Short Summary

We are a group of young people who all live in East Durham in the North East of England. We are being supported by a local creative youth organisation and a local web based news magazine to set up and run our own media project.

We are all aged between 11 and 24, we have come together because of our interested in writing, journalism, the media, social media, photography and radio and we have big plans.

The place where we live gets bad press, from people who don't live here and people who have a downer on the place! No where is perfect and we want to change people's opinions. We are aiming our project at young people, the same age as us, we want to get out there, talk about youth issues that are relevant to our age group, spread the word about local bands, music, events, places to go, things to do and whilst we do that we want to share people's stories. We want to show people how positive young people round here can be.... and we want to do it in a creative, engaging way. We want our magazine to look the business, we want our own local radio station and our own YouTube channel, we want to make it onto the local news and local TV and aim even higher- we want to go national!

The Creative Youth Organisation we work with is a not for profit, they have years of experience working with young people just like us. The staff there have worked with young people.... like forever and the people from Now East Durham know their stuff too so we know we are well supported.

Once we have our magazine up and running we know we can cover costs with relevant, youth focused advertising so we only need the money to get us started! Creative Youth Opportunities is a registrered CIC and they will help us with the financial side of things, making sure the money is spent properly, ethically and well. And because we will be working under them the whole not for profit thing will mean as we grow and can cover our costs, if we do make any profit it will go right back into doing projects with young poeple.

We think being part of this project will really help us in the future and we are sure the positive things we can promote will have a positive effect on other young people. We even think lots more young people will want to be involved once they see what a big success it is!

We need your help to get our big plans off the ground...once we are in production we are sure you will be impressed and glad you supported us! We are asking for £3,000 to get us enough, with a little from advertising, to be able to design and print our first quarterly magazine, if we don't reach our target, don't worry we won't change our plans and your money won't go to waste because we'll just print less for our first print run and make sure we get it all off the ground anyway, but wouldn't it be great if we could go big from the start and it's because you helped us!

story:
Promoting the Journals of the Twinned Souls
Time Travel Adventure & Romance Series...

  •    My name is Cym Early-Smith. I'm a writer, artist and educator enjoying life in the Pacific Northwest.  As the Program Director for Interactive History Co, my job is focused on designing and presenting hands-on curriculum that interweaves art, storytelling and history.  
  •    About 5 years ago, my love for teaching history expanded into writing about history in a way that involves and engages my readers directly in the story.  Most recently, that has been brought to life through the twists in time of my debut Time Travel Adventure & Romance series, Journals of the Twinned Souls, with its first and second books: The Janus Paradox - recently released on Amazon.com - and Book Two - The Janus Cypher - about to be released. 
    • Coming up fast:   I am launching my first two books at VCon - the premiere Science Fiction/Fantasy Convention in British Columbia - on October 2nd in Vancouver, BC.  And the truly serendipitous part of my story here, is that Vancouver, Canada is where the modern timeline of my story is based AND the theme for VCon this year is...Time Travel!
    • What Makes My Books Worth Sponsoring - What's the Story...?

    • First of all, everyone is most welcome to learn more about the 'storyverse' in the Journals of the Twinned Souls  by visiting my author's website at: www.Cymbric.com

    • In essence, the story behind the Journals of the Twinned Souls is one of 'Recognition'.  I think many people can connect with that concept because at one time or another, most of us have either read about or even experienced it for ourselves 

    • In fact, many cultures have cherished and preserved stories that center on the concept of Recognition, where certain people encounter one another and immediately connect on an often subtle, but soul-deep level – as friends, as confidants or lovers, even as rivals. We've all heard some variation of those tales about people who, for no apparent reason, experience a virtually instantaneous connection with one another. Often they overcome profound obstacles of great distance, culture or hardship before they eventually encounter each other, but when they do, they seem to immediately share a mutual kinship - a kinship so strong that if they stopped to think about it, they'd realize that in many ways it defies rational explanation.  

    • Some of these stories we know from our own lives and experiences. And some are the most famous stories in history, as old as the ancient Tale of Gilgamesh, or Shakespeare’s Romeo and Juliet.  Over the course of millennia the names and settings for these tales have changed - often many times in the retelling. And yet, all over the world and throughout history we have found such stories to be irresistible. They compel us to believe that we too, can find and share a bond with someone that is destined to endure through time. 

    • The stories from the Journals of the Twinned Souls are about people, who, through a sometimes heartrending kinship of spirit, have accompanied one another through hundreds of lifetimes. No matter how distant the journey or how difficult the circumstances, they've always found each other.  In Book One, "The Janus Paradox" everything changes in a way that will challenge that bond to its core and compel them to search for one another across centuries...

  •  Why This Campaign... With all the attendant costs of getting my name and my book titles out in the public eye, while attending Writers Conferences and Conventions, and promoting my books in every other way I can think of, I knew I would need an extra boost. Otherwise, as a debut author, it is all rather daunting and expensive, especially considering my tiny teacher's salary.  

What I Need & What You Get

  •  My hope is to consistently attend as many Writers Conferences and Fan Conventions as I can get to and to have a range of promotional materials available to help me stand out from the crowd and generate 'buzz' about Journals of the Twinned Souls - in addition to, quite honestly, sponsoring myself for the time I need to complete Book Three: "TimeBound".  And of course, IndieGoGo takes its ~ 10%, when all is done, for sponsoring the campaign site and processing the donations, etc.
  • In terms of what you get...
  • All of the 'Perks' for my campaign relate to terms that I've created as part of the story - many of them related to "Bridging" the mode by which my characters travel through time. My hope is this will entice and intrigue anyone who takes a glance at this campaign into buying a copy of one of my books through my website: www.cymbric.com, or contribute at a level that provides a copy.
     - Some of the unique perks I offer include "putting your name in lights" on the "!Book Launch!" Page of my Author's website at: http://www.cymbric.com/
  • Also available with some of the funding levels, will be:
      - Digital proof-copies of Book Two, The Janus Cypher, soon to be released on Amazon.  
     - The solution to the super secret cypher for the emblem on the front covers of my first two books. Visit my website and click on the "Extras" tab to see a larger version of the graphic and learn more about how its interactive elements can be transformed and expanded by you and what the end-product should resemble - as well as what its significance is to the story.  
     - Some contributors will receive 'all of the above' plus a Signed copy of Book One and/or Book Two, as desired. 
     - The last two items on the contribution ladder will not be found in any other campaign, as they are directly connected with the story-lines of my books: 
     - The 'Penultimate-Perk' takes its inspiration from Book One, The Janus Paradox, where one of the main characters is referred to as acting like a 'Skidlepadl', which is my made-up word - an amalgamation of a Norse/Gaelic term that refers to baby sea-turtles. (Why? Because the author adores sea turtles, of course ;)  Not only am I a highly original author, I am also the creator of "TummE Turtles", which are handmade covers for rewarm-able bags, which keep the inner bag from getting too hot, while allowing it to _stay_ warm for much longer, They are simply adorable, wonderfully soothing, comforting, and did I mention, 'adorable'? These "TummE Turtles" will be created especially for this campaign and designed with a medieval Viking look - no seriously  :) 
  • The 'Pinnacle-Perk' will be available to only 3 contributors: In addition to 'all of the above' other perks, I will name a character after you - or another name at your request (at the discretion of 'good taste', and at my editor's will, naturally) Following those caveats, the name of your choosing will be written into Book Three, "TimeBound".

The Impact

  • From the very start, this journey of becoming an author of a Time Travel/Adventure-Romance series has been an amazing and unique - albeit, completely unplanned, experience for me.  I have grown and learned a great deal about myself, as well as this newly discovered talent
  • People who saw this campaign were inspired to donate funds that took me beyond my original goal, which will help considerably in getting me and my book to more events, such as Book readings, signings, etc.

Challenges

Writing and looking to be published - or even Self-Publishing - is one of those pursuits that seems uniquely risky to the human heart, even one's psyche, as the writer must expose a very personal part of themselves that is born from their deepest imaginings.  When we put our writing out for someone else to read, in a way we're demanding they approve of our dream-worlds - even pay us money to become a part of it with us - investing themselves in a world of our creation. Honing that craft, pursuing leads and recommendations for where to submit our work to agents or publishers, working and reworking our chapters, our synopses our query letters, etc, etc, etc... costs not just money, but time and mental/emotional effort and all of that circles back to having the financial resources to do all that.

 

Other Ways that _Everyone_ Can Help

I know there are people who are not in a position to contribute funds - obviously, I count myself among you.  And yet, I also know that I have many supportive friends and acquaintances with an impressive array of talents and abilities independent of their pocketbooks...

  • If you have a desire to help me beyond any monetary contribution you may have made, or if you are limited in funds but rich in tech-savvy social media skills - or richer still in friends and contacts - then getting the word out and making some joyful noise in the 'ether' about funding the campaign for my 'Twinned Book' Launch would be >hugely< appreciated and your name too shall 'go up in lights' on the !Book Launch! Page of my website
  • To that end, please do be sure to use the Indiegogo share tools for your endeavors. 
    My Sincere thanks to all of you for visiting and

contributing in any way you can to my Journals of the Twinned Souls Campaign!

story:
VOTE PEACE

Elections are coming up very soon in Israel.
This is going to be a critical election: an election between two opposing visions of the Middle East. Between those who believe that there will never be peace - that the only option is to be prepared for the next round, and those who believe that peace is possible -that we have to talk no matter what happens, because only through peace can we all survive all together.


We are asking you to take part in convincing Israel and the Middle East that peace Is the solution.
We want to convince Israelis to take a chance on Peace, to vote for peace, to find a party that talk about peace and vote for it.

We need you to take a stand with us.
Prove, by showing your face, that there are good people in the entire region – that there is not just endless hate, but even friendship and love.


We will print and put those images on the street, on buses and in magazines to show Israel that there are people who believe in, and want, peace and we will ask them to give it a chance...to vote Peace


You always wanted to contribute for Peace ? 

You always asked yourself how to help israelis, Palestinians and the region of the middle East to reach Peace ?

Here, you have the opportunity to contribute to a major change !

Help us to convince the Israelis to vote NOT out of fear, NOT out of hate, but to vote FOR PEACE. Dont let them be victims of political propaganda.

Thanks to your contributions, together, we can advertise for peace !

Peace is the key of most of our problems. It is up to us, the new generation in Israel and the Middle East to break the circle, to prove that there is another path, a better future : Peace.

It is time we step forward ! It is time to vote for peace.

Help us to make it happen

What do we need the money for ?

We will launch a mass media campaign all over Israel in December and January, showing the faces of people from the Middle East (Palestinians, Iranians, Syrians, Turkish, Egyptians....) saying to the Israeli people :" we love you, we want peace with you " - VOTE FOR PEACE !

With the money we will be able to buy advertising spaces on street furnitures (bus stations) and billboards in every major city in Israel

Everybody in Israel will see our posters advertising for peace, just like they will see the messages of the political parties advertsing war

 
thanks

ronny

story:
Why should I read this book?

Everyone knows an atheist.  You may not know it, but you do.  Many atheists are closeted because of the social and familial stigma that comes with being an open atheist in a society full of religious believers.  Often referred to as the fastest growing demographic in America, those with no religious affiliation make up about 10-15% of the US population.  That means it's likely that 1 out of every 10 people you know either doesn't subscribe to an organized religion or doesn't believe in a supreme being at all.  

Understanding an Atheist is a book written by Kevin Davis, head writer at the popular blog DividedUnderGod.com.  This book was written for anyone who knows a nonbeliever, whether they're open about their beliefs or not.  In it, Kevin takes you through his own experiences, raised Catholic, once Evangelical Christian, then closeted atheist, now openly a nonbeliever and active in the atheist community.  Through this journey, readers will gain an understanding of what it's like for someone to abandon faith in the supernatural and gravitate toward evidence-based reasoning, ultimately facing the taboo of being a nonbeliever.  

The purpose of this book is not to tear down religion or the religious, but to bring to light the issues facing your atheist friends and family.  If you have a friend or family member who is an atheist you might have thought,

  • Is it ok to pray at meals when they're over for dinner?
  • Why do they hate God?
  • What do they think happens when we die?
  • Should I bring up their atheism in conversation or just ignore it?
  • Why don't they just go to church 'just in case'?

Understanding an Atheist will attempt to answer these questions for you, by giving you some insight into how the mind of an atheist operates, what they stand for, what prejudices they face, and how they feel, surrounded by religion every day.

Why contribute?

All contributors will receive an advance PDF copy of the book, compatible with any eReader, tablet or PC.  The PDF copy will be delivered by November 1, giving you enough time to read it before your family reunions over the holidays!

In addition, contributors may also receive:

  • Paperback copies of the book.
  • Paperback copies, signed by the author with the inscription of your choice.
  • A mention by name in the Special Thanks section of the book.
  • A one on one discussion with the author via Skype, to help you through any issues you may be having with your atheist loved ones (related to atheism of course, I'm not a sex therapist).
  • A personal meeting with the author over lunch, anywhere in the continental US, complete with a personal book signing.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, I ask that you share this campaign with anyone that you feel could benefit from this book.   Send the link via email, Facebook or Twitter.  Many atheists feel misunderstood by their loved ones and the aim of this book is to enhance that understanding and mend these relationships.
story_txt:
Why should I read this book?
Everyone knows an atheist.  You may not know it, but you do.  Many atheists are closeted because of the social and familial stigma that comes with being an open atheist in a society full of religious believers.  Often referred to as the fastest growing demographic in America, those with no religious affiliation make up about 10-15% of the US population.  That means it's likely that 1 out of every 10 people you know either doesn't subscribe to an organized religion or doesn't believe in a supreme being at all.  
Understanding an Atheist is a book written by Kevin Davis, head writer at the popular blog DividedUnderGod.com.  This book was written for anyone who knows a nonbeliever, whether they're open about their beliefs or not.  In it, Kevin takes you through his own experiences, raised Catholic, once Evangelical Christian, then closeted atheist, now openly a nonbeliever and active in the atheist community.  Through this journey, readers will gain an understanding of what it's like for someone to abandon faith in the supernatural and gravitate toward evidence-based reasoning, ultimately facing the taboo of being a nonbeliever.  
The purpose of this book is not to tear down religion or the religious, but to bring to light the issues facing your atheist friends and family.  If you have a friend or family member who is an atheist you might have thought,

Is it ok to pray at meals when they're over for dinner?
Why do they hate God?
What do they think happens when we die?
Should I bring up their atheism in conversation or just ignore it?
Why don't they just go to church 'just in case'?

Understanding an Atheist will attempt to answer these questions for you, by giving you some insight into how the mind of an atheist operates, what they stand for, what prejudices they face, and how they feel, surrounded by religion every day.


Why contribute?
All contributors will receive an advance PDF copy of the book, compatible with any eReader, tablet or PC.  The PDF copy will be delivered by November 1, giving you enough time to read it before your family reunions over the holidays!
In addition, contributors may also receive:

Paperback copies of the book.
Paperback copies, signed by the author with the inscription of your choice.
A mention by name in the Special Thanks section of the book.

A personal meeting with the author over lunch, anywhere in the continental US, complete with a personal book signing.



Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't contribute, I ask that you share this campaign with anyone that you feel could benefit from this book.   Send the link via email, Facebook or Twitter.  Many atheists feel misunderstood by their loved ones and the aim of this book is to enhance that understanding and mend these relationships.

story:
It's tough to be a small arts organization.

It's tough to be a small town. 

But we've learned a lot in the four years that we've organized The Festival of Women Writers in the small, Catskills town of Hobart, New York. 

Creative, hard-working and determined people can accomplish a lot with the help of their local community and their global community. They can make a platform to raise the visibility of creative women and nurture the blossoming of others. They can celebrate the life of the mind and the universally compelling appeal of literature. We've made a great beginning in the past three years and we mean to keep growing and developing our program.

We NEED your help. If you've supported us in the past three years, we thank you heartily. We use the funds raised through our Indiegogo campaign to provide honoraria and lodging assistance to our participating writers. We have twenty-three participating writers for Festival 2016. They will each read their work and will offer fourteen different workshops. We are also offering four Intensives, six-hour workshops for the committed writer. All of the weekend's readings are free and open to the public. 

We've grown and flourished because of the vital support we've gotten through our Indiegogo campaign. You are part of our GLOBAL arts community. When the very first Hobart Book Village Festival of Women Writers was held in September 2013, my sister Cheryl and I realized first-hand how vital it was to our success that we had a community of shoulders to the wheel. We still NEED you. 

PLEASE let us know you're with us, that you support The Hobart Book Village Festival of Women Writers. 

PLEASE contribute whatever amount you're comfortable with and know that we appreciate each contribution.

story:
Did you know that 9 out of 10 startups fail? All these failed attempts take away too much time and energy from entrepreneurs. We should change this! We need a smarter way of building new innovative companies. The Startup Studio Playbook will teach you a new venture building model. One that takes out much of the risk from creating startups.
  • It will be a 300-pages book available in digital, audio and hardcover format. 
  • It's aimed at entrepreneurs and people who deal with innovation. 
  • Every backer will get a Christmas Gift, shipped to you on 17th December 2015.

Why I'm doing this

Hi, I’m Attila, entrepreneur. When I built my first startup, we participated in one of Europe's best accelerators - Startup Sauna, we talked to our customers, pivoted, put everything we have into our idea. And we still failed. 

If you’ve ever built a startup, you know the feeling. Even if you put all your passion and energy into your idea, there’s still a high risk of not succeeding. 

Before starting my next company, I wanted to find a smarter way. One that takes out the risk of startup building. That turns venture building in something that feels like playing with your Legos. This is how I discovered the startup studio, a.k.a. venture builder model.

Early this year I wrote two publications on this topic. But I wanted to do more, so everybody can learn about this opportunity. 


What is a startup studio

Simply put, a startup studio is an entrepreneurial organization. It’s like a movie studio. In a movie studio, you are building multiple movies simultaneously, using well-tested processes. In a startup studio, you are experimenting with multiple ideas and products.

If one of them fails, you keep the people and start something new. You don't lose your talented team. And if one of your initiatives is successful, you spin it off into a dedicated company. And you continue to grow it like any other startup. Huge potential with minimal risk.

(Startup studios are startups that build startups. )
Since early 2015 I'm working in such a studio. And it's amazing! We have a great team of entrepreneurs and developers. And we are building exciting new products. We've already built 6 startups, and we will build many more.
When I first researched this topic, I wanted to find out how many other studios there are. And I was excited to find out that there are more and more.

(Startup studios and their portfolio companies. Picture from Startup Studio Trends, 2015)

And these studios do better and better every year. Venture capital Investments into studios doubles every two years. Studios grow more mature and start more and more companies every year. Besides entrepreneurs, large companies also started to use this model to boost their innovation.

If you look at the most popular entrepreneurship magazines, you will find more and more studio related news and articles:

"This ‘startup studio model’ is becoming increasingly popular in the US and Europe"  on Tech.eu

"Being a Startup Studio means that we develop ideas into products and products into companies. We’re lean and the ability to quickly innovate, build and test new products gives us much more flexibility than a traditional rigid startup model." on RyanNegri.com

"Harvard Is Taking on NYC with Its Upcoming HBS Startup Studio"  on BostInno

"if you ask most startup studio owners, they will tell you that they are simply professionalising the discovery and traction phase."  on TheNordicWeb.com

"Entrepreneur-turned-investor is a classic story arc in Silicon Valley but recently the plot has earned a twist. Certain operators are foregoing the traditional path of joining a traditional VC to instead create a studio-like holding operation." on TechCrunch

"You’ll want to get used to the idea because we’re going to see a lot more venture-building organizations emerging." on VentureBeat


You can find many more stories about startup studios on Buildtogether.co, which is maintained by the great people behind the startup studio eFounders.


And I want you to know all about this opportunity. This is why I already published two short documents about this subject. And this is why I'm writing the Startup Studio Playbook. So you can use this knowledge to your own advantage.


Why should you care

More and more people are discovering the power and opportunity of entrepreneurship. People want to be free and work on something meaningful. Something that provides them with the financials for a worry-free life and gives them enough flexibility to spend time on family, friends and themselves. 

This is hard to achieve in a large corporation. I've been there. And I quit, so I can build something that I find meaningful. I know that more and more people are doing the same or want to do it. For more and more people, entrepreneurship and building a thriving startup is the answer.


But building a business is challenging. And if you want to build a startup - an experimental organization to create something groundbreaking - then you face serious challenges. The old formula is to find the perfect idea, find the perfect cofounders, build the perfect product and raise the necessary funds. But this is not so easy in most parts of the world.

This is why 9 out of 10 startups fail. If you've already experimented with a startup, you know the feeling. If you prepare to launch your first company, you are probably worried about this.

But why would we just accept these grim chances? Why not look for a better way? Why not leave behind the old formula that feels like risky gambling and try something that feels like exciting exploration? 


Startup Studio Playbook 

The Startup Studio Playbook will show you a better method for building a business. It will be a 300-page comprehensive guide. It is aimed at entrepreneurs, investors, innovation managers and their teams. It will be full of interviews, stories and best practices that will teach you how to use this model to become a successful venture builder.


The Startup Studio Playbook will show you the world of startup studios in three different ways:

  • In the first part of the book you will read interviews with successful studio founders. In these interviews we will discuss their motivation, vision, challenges, highlights and lowlights of their journey.
  • The second part will tell you stories of the greatest studio hits, and some of the ugly failures in a novel style. We will unfold the journey of the selected companies. From the birth of the idea, through the building and fundraising stage right until their exit. Expect some drama.
  • The third part will be a how-to-guide. It will give you hands-on methods for building the concept for a studio. Hiring a great team, coming up with viable ideas, building your first companies, establishing great investor relations…

We already have commitment and interest from a dozen studios who want to share their stories. You can expect stories like

  • From zero to hero - Building a studio as sole entrepreneur
  • Money rain - How to raise millions in days
  • Homebred cash cows - Successful bootstrapped studios
  • Around the table - Holacracy and co-ownership for studio governance
  • Failure is always an option - The ugly side of the studio model

With your contribution, me and my team will create a well-researched, beautifully designed, unique book. 


Your rewards 

Thanks to the flexibility of the Indiegogo platform we created many offers, so that you find the best one for you. We are excited to share these rewards with you:

  • All backers of this campaign will get a Christmas Gift package that will contain a digital postcard and two short ebooks on startup studios. 
  • You can get the Startup Studio Playbook in ebook, audiobook and limited edition hardcover format. 
  • Some Indiegogo-exclusive packages give you access to backer-only updates and unedited background material. 
  • You can get one-on-one video chat with me, to ask any questions you might have about studios. I’m happy to help you create and grow your own studio. 
  • We will also unveil exciting new perks as part of soon-to-be-announced stretch goals. 

You will receive the Christmas Gift package by 17th December 2015. You will get the digital version of the Startup Studio Playbook in May 2016, and you will get the hardcover after June 2016.


Christmas Gift

Before we started this campaign, we made our homework, and did a thorough research on startup studios. Between May and November we published two short ebooks, both priced at $3. Now you will get both of these for free, and a nice digital Christmas postcard, with any perk you select.


Startup Studio Trends
  • Originally published in July, this updated ebook will contain an analysis of 51 studios and 212 of their portfolio companies.
  • You will see lists of these companies, and how they grow in number.
  • You will learn about the ever increasing venture funding of studios and how they exit with their portfolio companies.
Anatomy of Startup Studios
  • Published on October 2015. This ebook is based on interviews with some of the most successful and exciting studios: Betaworks, Disrupted, Drukka, eFounders, Finleap, Lab.Coop, sFBI, Quasar Ventures.
  • You will read about the foundations of a great studio. How to build a rockstar team, how to organize day-to-day operations, and build lucrative investor relations.
  • You will also read a long list of pros and cons of the startup studio model.

Roadmap

We are keeping a tight schedule so you can read the Startup Studio Playbook as soon as possible. We already completed much of the data gathering and quantitative research of studios. What remains are the in-depth interviews with some of the greatest startup studios, and then the editing and publishing.  



Team

Both creating this campaign, and creating the Startup Studio Playbook are formidable challenges. I'm lucky that I work together with enthusiastic and talented people who can make this happen.

Patricia Krcsma is a fellow entrepreneur and marketer at Drukka Startup Studio. She is the Head of Marketing of one of our rising stars, Helpy.hu which is an on-demand cleaning platform. Patricia helped me to shape our communication plan, so we reach all those people who can get value out of the Startup Studio Playbook.

Tom Juskó is a fellow entrepreneur. We know each other since we met on a Hackathon-in-a-box event. Tom and his team were fantastic partners in creating our campaign video.

Csaba Rittling is a close friend, ever since we volunteered for the same student organization during college. Nowadays Csaba is a commercial photographer. He helps me to capture some of the pivotal moments of the editorial process.

Tamás Turcsán is the founder of Connect East Incubator, lector of the Hungarian version of Lean Startup, journalist, fellow entrepreneur, organizer of the Hackathon-in-a-box events. And a friend who helped me throughout my entrepreneurial journey. Tamás will make sure that I bring the most out of the Startup Studio Playbook.

To publish the book, I selected a publishing partner that supports self-publishers and already has a great track record of publishing unique books. As we are still finalizing our agreement I can't just yet reveal their name. But I can ensure you that they have all the technical background and expertise that we need to produce a high quality product for you.

I also would like to thank Natalie Edwards from startup studio sFBI. She was kind enough to read early drafts of this campaign, and provided me with the guidance to improve it. 


Risks & Challenges

My team and i have a track record on punctuality, and we will do everything to deliver your rewards on time. We already have commitments from studios to dedicate their time and wisdom for the interviews. And we are already working with designers to prepare everything ahead.

However, there might be unforeseen challenges ahead. We will keep you well informed throughout the entire project, about our achievements and issues. 

According to our plan you will receive the Christmas Gift on 17th December 2015. You will get the ebook and audio version of the book in May 2016 and the hardcover in July.


How you can help

The success of this campaign depends on getting the word out. And you can help us with this! Tell your friends and colleagues, who are interested in entrepreneurship and innovation.
In the Startup Studio Playbook we will dedicate a section to those people who help us spread the world. Get your name into the book by sharing our campaign!

Thank you!

Attila


--- 

Author bio

(Photo by  Csaba Rittling)

Hi, I’m Attila, entrepreneur from Budapest. I started my career as a volunteer at IAESTE. Then I worked at IBM and Citigroup as Project Manager. But in 2014 I felt that I need to change directions. I quit, and started my first startup, Rate My Speech.

It was supposed to help people improve their public speaking skills. Me and my team were absolutely passionate about our idea. So we entered all startup competitions and told about our vision. This got us into the Finnish Startup Sauna accelerator, and we were able to visit Silicon Valley thanks to a program called Startup Spring.

Unfortunately after ten months of hard work, we had to admit to ourselves that our value proposition and business model was not strong enough. Our startup failed, and the team scattered.

It took me some months to recover. And I decided, that before starting my new venture, I’ll find a better way to do it. I looked at many entrepreneurship programs, accelerators, incubators, but all had the same limitations. You had to build your startup from zero, put in all your soul and risk everything – and your chances were still only 1 to 10 to make it.

But then, fortunately, I found the solution. I joined a company called Drukka that used a so-called startup studio model. And the rest is history.


FAQ

In what language are you publishing the Startup Studio Playbook?
The book will be in english. We would love to publish it also in other languages, but we need sponsors to do that. The amount we are asking for in the "Sponsor a language" perk would gully go to translation and design of a custom cover.

On what device will I be able to read the digital version?
We will make sure that the digital version is available on all major ebook platforms.

Why are worldwide shipping costs so high?
Almost all of the hardcover perks come with a $19 shipping cost. We spent a lot of time finding the best option available, and the partner we found operates at these costs. This is to ensure that we can ship to anywhere and be sure that your package arrives on time, in a perfect condition.

If you have any more questions, please add a comment and we will answer as soon as we can.

It was
supposed to help people improve their public speaking skills. Me and my team
were absolutely passionate about our idea. So we entered all startup
competitions and told about our vision. This got us into the Finnish Startup
Sauna accelerator, and we were able to visit Silicon Valley thanks to a program called Startup Spring.
Unfortunately
after ten months of hard work, we had to admit to ourselves that our value
proposition and business model was not strong enough. Our startup failed, and the
team scattered. 
It took me some months to recover. And I decided, that
before starting my new venture, I’ll find a better way to do it. I looked at many
entrepreneurship programs, accelerators, incubators, but all had the same
limitations. You had to build your startup from zero, put in all your soul and
risk everything – and your chances were still only 1 to 10 to make it.
But then, fortunately, I found the solution. I joined a
company called Drukka that used a so-called startup studio model. And the rest is history.



FAQ
In what language are you publishing the Startup Studio Playbook?

The book will be in english. We would love to publish it also in other languages, but we need sponsors to do that. The amount we are asking for in the "Sponsor a language" perk would gully go to translation and design of a custom cover.

On what device will I be able to read the digital version?
We will make sure that the digital version is available on all major ebook platforms.

Why are worldwide shipping costs so high?
Almost all of the hardcover perks come with a $19 shipping cost. We spent a lot of time finding the best option available, and the partner we found operates at these costs. This is to ensure that we can ship to anywhere and be sure that your package arrives on time, in a perfect condition.

If you have any more questions, please add a comment and we will answer as soon as we can.

story:
Friction Talks is an Oxford-based collective staging creative events in a venue near you. The clue’s in the name: we like to shake things up a little and bring you speakers —emerging and established writers, artists, campaigners and musicians—who are each, in their own way, breaking the mold. We stage our events in easily accessible, democratic spaces. Most importantly, we do it either for free or at the minimum cost to our audience.

Over the past two years we have staged events with writers and artists including Paolo Scott, Iain Sinclair, Grayson Perry, Marina Warner, Peter Tatchell, James Attlee and Jem Finer, among others.

We are now seeking funding to put our activities on a more sustainable footing: in other words, to cover our costs. All the money we raise will go towards supporting the series into 2016. The autumn 2015 programme has included events with short-story writer Claire-Louise Bennett, Russian anarchist poet Kirill Medvedev and columnist and campaigner George Monbiot. (Our event with writer and BBC Arts Editor Will Gompertz, mentioned in the video, has had to be postponed until spring 2016 due to a commitment clash). The fantastic response we have had to the talks this autumn, with packed events at Quarter Horse and our  George Monbiot rewilding event at the Ultimate Picture Palace an advance sell-out, convince us we are on the right track. But we need your help in order to carry on!

We have a range of exciting perks lined up to reward you for supporting the programme, from limited edition mugs and T-shirts to books and diaries from cult London publisher Redstone Press and works by artists specially created for our campaign, making this the ultimate one-stop shop for your christmas presents! Thinking ahead how to beat those January blues, check out the delicious menu for our Midwinter Fundraising Feast in the Gallery section of the site. 

Please get the word out about our campaign: that way we can keep on bringing art to where the people are. Thank you!

Please get the word out about our campaign: that way we can keep on bringing art to where the people
are. Thank you!

story:
Short Summary

After writing nearly two hundred computer science lessons and more than seven complete books, I was still at the place where tackling JavaScript for young students seemed like a daunting task. With the hard decision to make between navigating the HTML, CSS, JS combo, or being restricted to dull text-based projects, my preference was to wait until a more user-friendly platform was introduced.

Here we are in 2020, and I've FINALLY found a platform that lets me present JavaScript to students in a fun and simple way, with the rich examples and playful experiences that young students deserve.

Join me in working to get this short (but powerful) book to parents, teachers, and libraries so that young students can start their exciting journey to understanding JavaScript programming.

 

What We Need & What You Get

This will be my first self-published title, so without the financial backing of a large publishing house, I'm going to need to get the word around in a BIG WAY!

Here's what I need from you:

  • I need less than $500 to cover the initial expenses of getting a new book to market.  I'll be starting the book in digital and in paperback on the Amazon platform, so there won't be a huge expenditure for building stock.
  • I'm trying to keep my asks tiny so that EVERYONE can get in on the fun!
  • Whether I reach my goal or not, I'll be able to get this book out in one form or another.  (It's almost already complete and there are copies out in the wild with 5th-grade teachers as we speak!)

 

The Impact

Your money will help me get this book published so that we can show the big houses that text-based languages can be taught with playful purpose.  There's no need to keep churning out boring titles that miss the mark with young students, poisoning them to the idea of programming before they've even started.  This book will get kids coding quickly, teaching them how to handle bugs and unexpected challenges.  Just what every teacher wants to see!
 

Risks & Challenges

I am just one person, and I'm writing and laying out the book by myself.  While there's hardly anything left to do, I am determined to test-drive this book with teachers and incorporate meaningful feedback.  That could, potentially, push back my release date while I see to important edits.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute financially, you can still be a VERY important part of this campaign!  Please consider sharing it on social media...or going one step further and writing emails to anyone that you know who might want to take a look at our campaign.

Don't feel like doing a cold-call to someone that you think might enjoy this?  Send me a message with some names and emails and I'll do it myself!

Thanks for being a part of this!

~Kiki
